Title: Siemens WinCC Flexible Hmiload Remote Code Execution
Description: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability that leads to command execution.

Title: IOServer Directory Traversal Vulnerability
Description: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability in IOServer

Title: IOServer DoS crashing the server 0-Day
Description: Remote Denial Of Service in IOServer

Title: InterSystems Cache DoS ver 1
Description: Remote Denial Of Service in InterSystems Cache

Title: Siemens WINCC DiagAgent Buffer Overflow Remote Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow and installs an agent into the target host.

Title: Progea Movicon 11 DoS crashing the server
Description: Remote Denial Of Service in Progea Movicon 11

Title: Kaskad Daserver Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption to installs an agent into the target host.

Title: Atvise webMI2ADS Directory Traversal Vulnerability
Description: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability in Atvise webMI2ADS server.

Title: HP Data Protector Cell Manager Opcode 259 Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The specific flaw exists within crs.exe which listens by default on a random TCP port. When parsing different opcodes, the process blindly copies user supplied data into a fixed-length stack buffer. A remote attacker can abuse this to execute remote code under the context of the SYSTEM user.

Title: Adrenalin Player ASX Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Adrenalin Player .ASX files. The vulnerability is caused due to lack of boundary checks in exporting an ASX file witch causes an Buffer Overflow of the stack and a SEH attack is possible due to a vulnerable DLL included in the software.

Title: Adrenalin Player WAX Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Adrenalin Player .WAX files. The vulnerability is caused due to lack of boundary checks in exporting a WAX file witch causes an Buffer Overflow of the stack and a SEH attack is possible due to a vulnerable DLL included in the software.

Title: Oracle Java Dynamic Binding Remote Code Execution Exploit Update
Description: An error in the way that Java implements dynamic binding can be abused to overwrite public final fields. This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.This update adds the CVE number to the exploit.

Title: ASN.1 Bit String SPNEGO exploit Update
Description: Multiple integer overflows in Microsoft ASN.1 library (MSASN1.DLL), as used in LSASS.EXE, CRYPT32.DLL, and other Microsoft executables and libraries on Windows NT 4.0, 2000, and XP, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via ASN.1 encodings that cause arbitrary heap data to be overwritten.This update modifies the runtime value for this exploit.

Title: HP System Management Homepage ginkgosnmp.inc Command Injection Exploit
Description: The ginkgosnmp.inc PHP script in HP System Management Homepage is vulnerable to OS command injection.This vulnerability allows remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on the affected machine with SYSTEM privileges.

Title: MediaCoder LST File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A Buffer Overflow exist in Mediacoder when parsing .LST files. The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in Mediacoder when handling .LST files beginning with http://, when the application tries to obtain a stream from an url. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted .LST file.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k pprFlattenRec Vulnerability Exploit Update 2
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in win32k.sys when the EPATHOBJ::pprFlattenRec() doesn't initialize the pointer to the next memory chunk.This update adds support to Windows 2003, Windows 2008 and Windows Vista

Title: AudioCoder M3U Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: AudioCoder contains a buffer prone to exploitation via an overly long string. The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in AudioCoder when handling .m3u files beginning with http://, when the application tries to obtain a stream from an url. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted .m3u file.

Title: Google Sketchup MAC Pict Stack Corruption Exploit
Description: Google Sketchup fails to validate the input when parsing an crafted skp file with Pict texture, leading to an arbitrary stack offset overwrite and finally to an arbitrary code execution.

Title: Linux Kernel perf_swevent_init Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the Linux kernel. The perf_swevent_init function in kernel/events/core.c in the Linux kernel before 3.8.9 uses an incorrect integer data type, which allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted perf_event_open system call.

Title: FreeBSD mmap ptrace Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in FreeBSD.The FreeBSD virtual memory system allows files to be memory-mapped. All or parts of a file can be made available to a process via its address space.The process can then access the file using memory operations rather than filesystem I/O calls. Due to insufficient permission checks in the virtual memory system, a tracing process (such as a debugger) may be able to modify portions of the traced process's address space to which the traced process itself does not have write access.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k pprFlattenRec Vulnerability Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in win32k.sys when the EPATHOBJ::pprFlattenRec() doesn't initialize the pointer to the next memory chunk.This update adds support to Microsoft Windows 8.

Title: Microsoft Office PNG File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Buffer overflow in Microsoft Office allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted PNG data in an Office document, leading to improper memory allocation.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer COALineDashStyleArray Integer Overflow Exploit (MS13-037)
Description: This module exploits an integer overflow vulnerability in the Vector Markup Language (VML) on Internet Explorer. The vulnerability exists in the handling of the dashstyle.array length for VML shapes on the vgx.dll module.This vulnerability was one of the 2013's Pwn2Own challenges.

Title: Mozilla Firefox plugin objects Privileged Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote code injection in Mozilla Firefox by using vulnerabilities CVE-2013-0758 and CVE-2013-0757.

Title: Zoom Player BMP File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Zoom Player is prone to a buffer-overflow via a specially crafted BMP image with an overly large "biClrUsed" value.

Title: XnView XCF Processing Image Layer Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Xnview is prone to a stack based buffer overflow which can be exploited through a specially crafted image layer within an XCF file.

Title: Sketchup MAC Pict Material Palette Stack Corruption Exploit
Description: Sketchup fails to validate the input when parsing an embedded MAC Pict texture, leading to an arbitrary stack offset overwrite and finally to an arbitrary code execution.

Title: Artweaver JPG Image Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error when processing JPG image files and can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted JPG image file.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k pprFlattenRec Vulnerability Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in win32k.sys when the EPATHOBJ::pprFlattenRec() doesn't initialize the pointer to the next memory chunk.

Title: IntraSrv Simple Web Server Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: IntraSrv is prone to a buffer overflow within GET requests with an overly long HOST parameter.

Title: Oracle Java Driver Manager Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Oracle Java taking advantages of the java.sql.DriverManager class. The specific flaw exists within the usage of java.sql.DriverManager. The issue lies in an implicit call to toString() that is made within a doPrivileged block. This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.This vulnerability was one of the 2013's Pwn2Own challenges.

Title: MongoDB nativeHelper Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in MongoDB server. An arbitrary value passed as a parameter to the nativeHelper function in MongoDB server allows an attacker to control the execution flows to achieve remote code execution.

Title: Serva TFTPD Service Large Read Requests Parsing DoS
Description: The Serva32 TFTPD service is vulnerable to a buffer overflow vulnerability when parsing large read requests. When the application reads in a large buffer the application crashes.

Title: Wordpress W3 Total Cache PHP Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in W3 Total Cache plugin for Wordpress. Certain macros such as mfunc allow to inject PHP code into comments. By injecting a crafted comment into a valid post an attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code on systems running vulnerable installations of W3 Total Cache.

Title: Apple Mac OS X DirectoryService AllocFromProxyStruct Buffer Underflow DoS
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the Mac OS X DirectoryService by sending a specially crafted packet to the 625/TCP port.

Title: HP Intelligent Management IctDownloadServlet Directory Traversal Exploit
Description: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability in HP Intelligent Management Center. Due to a lack of authentication and a directory traversal vulnerability in the IctDownloadServlet component, an attacker can retrieve arbitrary files.

Title: HP Intelligent Management FaultDownloadServlet Directory Traversal Exploit
Description: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability in HP Intelligent Management Center. Due to a lack of authentication and a directory traversal vulnerability in the FaultDownloadServlet component, an attacker can retrieve arbitrary files.

Title: Symantec AMS Intel Handler Service DoS
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Symantec AMS Intel Handler service by sending a malformed packet to the 38292/TCP port to crash the application.

Title: IBM SPSS SamplePower Vsflex8l ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Buffer overflow when a special malformed string is assigned to the ComboList or ColComboList property. The code looks for a '#'in the string then copies into a global buffer in the data section with a static size of 0x64.

Title: Keylogger Update 2
Description: This update resolves an issue while trying to run the "Keylogger" module.

Title: IBM SPSS SamplePower C1sizer ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A vulnerability when handling the TabCaption buffer, C1sizer.ocx does not properly check the size before running lstrcatA and therefore will cause a buffer overflow.

Title: Novell ZENworks Mobile Management Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the Novell ZENworks Mobile Management application by injecting code in the PHP session file and leveraging a Local File Inclusion in mdm.php to execute the injected PHP code.

Title: Oracle Java Font Handling Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: A specific flaw exists within the handling of CFF-based OpenType fonts. The issue lies in two operators that allow for reading and writing elements beyond the allocated buffers. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code under the context of the current process.

Title: SAP Netweaver Message Server _MsJ2EE_AddStatistics Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: The Message Server component of SAP Netweaver is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability when the _MsJ2EE_AddStatistics function handles a specially crafted request with iflag value 0x0c MS_J2EE_SEND_TO_CLUSTERID, or 0x0d MS_J2EE_SEND_BROADCAST.This vulnerability can be exploited by remote unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Buffer Overflow Exploit (MS13-046)
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Windows kernel calling to "DisplayConfigGetDeviceInfo" function with crafted parameters.

Title: Wireshark DRDA Dissector DoS
Description: The DRDA protocol dissector in Wireshark can enter an infinite loop when processing an specially crafted DRDA packet with the iLength field set to 0, causing Wireshark to stop responding.

Title: EMC AlphaStor Library Control Program Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to an error in the AlphaStor Library Control Program when processing commands and can be exploited to cause a buffer overflow.

Title: PHPMyAdmin Replace Table Prefix Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module abuses a vulnerability in phpMyAdmin 3.5.x before 3.5.8 and 4.x before 4.0.0-rc3 that allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a /e\x00 sequence, which is not properly handled before making a preg_replace function call within the "Replace table prefix" feature.

Title: Light HTTP Daemon Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Light HTTPD is prone to a buffer overflow when handling specially crafted GET request packets.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Divide Error Exception DoS (MS13-046)
Description: This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability calling to "NtGdiScaleViewportExtEx" function by using crafted parameters.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Kingsoft Office wpsio Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: In module wpsio, a BSTR string stored in the file is copied to the stack buffer, without checking its length, leading to a stack buffer overflow.

Title: EMC AlphaStor Device Manager 0x41 Command Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A flaw exists within Device Manager (rrobotd.exe), which listens by default on port 3000, when parsing the 0x41 command.

Title: ERDAS ER Viewer ERM_convert_to_correct_webpath Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A Buffer Overflow exists within ERDAS ER Viewer due to a boundary error within the ERM_convert_to_correct_webpath() function in (ermapper_u.dll) when parsing file paths via a specially crafted ERS file.

Title: Schneider Electric Accutech Manager Heap Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a heap overflow vulnerability in the Schneider Electric Accutech Manager Server by sending a malformed packet to the 2537/TCP port to execute arbitrary code or crash the server.

Title: GlobalSCAPE CuteZIP Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: CuteZip is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling a specially crafted ZIP file.

Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Windows kernel (win32k.sys) when a crafted TTF font is open.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CGenericElement Object Use-After-Free Exploit
Description: Use-after-free occurs when a CGenericElement object is freed, but a reference is kept live on the Document and reused during rendering.

Title: BigAnt IM Server DDNF Username Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: BigAnt IM Server is vulnerable to a buffer-overflow within the AntDS.exe component when handling an overly long username.

Title: HP Intelligent Management Center mibFileUpload Servlet Remote Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote code execution vulnerability in HP Intelligent Management Center by using the "mibFileUpload" servlet to upload an arbitrary .JSP file.

Title: Firebird SQL CNCT Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in Firebird SQL by sending a malformed packet to the 3050/TCP port.

Title: PHP Parsing Variant Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A Buffer overflow against the com_print_typeinfo function in PHP running on Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted arguments that trigger incorrect handling of COM object VARIANT types.

Title: 3S CoDeSys Gateway Server Arbitrary File Upload Exploit
Description: 3S Codesys Gateway Server is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability that allows arbitrary file creation.

Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Windows kernel (win32k.sys) when a crafted TTF font is open.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugsor have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Oracle Java Dynamic Binding Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: An error in the way that Java implements dynamic binding can be abused to overwrite public final fields.This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: Nagios history Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in Nagios history.cgi by sending a malformed host parameter.

Title: Oracle Java CMM cmmColorConvert Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: The color management(CMM) funcionality in Oracle Java is prune to a memory corruption vulnerability which allows to run Java code outside the sandbox.

Title: Honeywell HSC Remote Deployer ActiveX Arbitrary HTA Execution Exploit
Description: This modules exploits a vulnerability found in the Honewell HSC Remote Deployer ActiveX. This control can be abused by using the LaunchInstaller() function to execute an arbitrary HTA from a remote location.

Title: Apple Mac OS X Samba NetWkstaTransportEnum Request Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Mac OS X Samba server.When a specially crafted call to "NetWkstaTransportEnum" RPC function is processed by the Samba server, it produces a heap overflow.

Title: Siemens SIMATIC WinCC SCADA RegReader ActiveX Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: An unspecified error in the RegReader ActiveX control can be exploited to cause a buffer overflow.

Title: BigAnt Server DUPF Command Arbitrary File Upload Exploit
Description: BigAnt Server is prone to an arbitrary file upload and execute through a DUPF command.

Title: Schneider Electric Interactive Graphical SCADA System Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This Stack-based buffer overflow exploits a vulnerability in Schneider Electric's Interactive Graphical SCADA System (IGSS) that allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted packet to TCP port-12397.

Title: ActFax RAW Server Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A vulnerability in ActFax Server RAW server used to transfer fax messages without protocols. Data fields. @F506,@F605, and @F000 are vulnerable.

Title: Adobe Acrobat Reader acroform api With Sandbox Bypass Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Adobe Acrobat Professional .PDF files. The vulnerability is caused due to memory corruption method in acroform.api. This can be exploited to cause code execution when a specially crafted .PDF file is opened in Adobe Reader or is opened embedded in a browser.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer SLayoutRun Use-After-Free Exploit (MS13-009)
Description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer where a CParaElement node is released but a reference is still kept in CDoc. This memory is reused when a CDoc relayout is performed.

Title: Microsoft Windows Shell Briefcase Processing Integer Overflow Exploit(MS12-072)
Description: An integer overflow occurs in Windows Shell when accesing a crafted briefcase using webdav, allowing remote users execute arbitrary code.

Title: KingView KingMess Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: KingView is prone to a buffer-overflow exploit when the KingMess process handles specially crafted KVL files (log files).

Title: Microsoft Windows NFS NULL Dereference DoS (MS13-014)
Description: This modules exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability in "nfssvr.sys" by sending a NFS file renaming crafted request to the target.This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Oracle Java 7U11 JMX Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The default Java security properties configuration does not restrict access to certain objects in the com.sun.jmx.mbeanserver packages. This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Improper Message Handling Vulnerability Exploit (MS13-005)
Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows kernel improperly handles window broadcast messages. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

Title: freeSSHd SSH Server Authentication Bypass Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: A vulnerability in the freeSSHd SSH Server allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a crafted session. This module exploits the vulnerability and installs an agent into the target host.

Title: Procyon Core Server HMI Scada Coreservice Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: Vulnerability in the coreservice.exe component of Procyon Core Server versions 1.13 and below. While processing a password, the application fails to do proper bounds checking before copying data into a buffer on the stack. This causes a buffer overflow and allows it to overwrite a structured exception handling record, allowing for unauthenticated remote code execution.This version updates runtime value to the appropriate for this case.

Title: Cool PDF Reader Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Cool PDF Reader is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling pdf documents with a specially crafted stream.

Title: Adobe Acrobat Reader acroform.api Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Adobe Acrobat Professional .PDF files. The vulnerability is caused due to memory corruption method in acroform.api. This can be exploited to cause code execution when a specially crafted .PDF file is opened in Adobe Reader or is opened embedded in a browser.

Title: Enterasys NetSight nssyslogd PRI Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A vulnerability exists within the nssyslogd.exe component, when parsing a syslog message. The process does not properly validate the size of thedestination buffer and copies user supplied data into a fixed-length buffer on the stack.

Title: cslib improvements
Description: This update resolves an issue in cslib and One Link Multiple Clientsides Exploit

Title: Sparklabs Viscosity Python Exec Local Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: The setuid-set ViscosityHelper binary insecurely executes certain scripts and can be exploited to gain escalated privileges via symlink attacks.

Title: EMC AlphaStor Device Manager Command Injection Exploit
Description: The Device Manager service (rrobotd.exe) in EMC AlphaStor is prone to an OS command injection vulnerability when processing DCP commands. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this in order to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges on the vulnerable machine.

Title: Novell GroupWise gwcls1 ActiveX Malicious Pointer Exploit
Description: Vulnerabilities exist within methods exposed by gwcls1.dll which accept pointer and perform operations on the potentially malicious pointer without validation.

Title: NTR ActiveX Control Check Method Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability when handling a url can be exploited via a crafted "bstrParams" parameter passed to the "Check()" method.

Title: Adobe Flash Player SWF Load Crafted Module Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player triggered when processing a SWF file and this load a crafted dll module. This module runs a malicious web site on the CORE IMPACT Console and waits for an unsuspecting user to trigger the exploit by connecting to the web site.This update improves the reliability of the exploit.

Title: Sunway Force Control SCADA SMNP NetDBServer Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: A stack based buffer overflow in the SNMP NetDBServer service of Sunway Forcecontrol is triggered when sending an overly long string to the listening service on port 2001.This version updates runtime value to the appropriate for this case.

Title: Adobe Flash Player SWF Load Crafted Module Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player triggered when processing a SWF file and this load a crafted dll module. This module runs a malicious web site on the CORE IMPACT Console and waits for an unsuspecting user to trigger the exploit by connecting to the web site.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CButton Object Use After Free Exploit Update
Description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a use after free vulnerability caused by an object that was not properly allocated or is deleted.This update adds support for additional target platforms.

Title: Exploit Description Update
Description: This update modifies the description in the file header.

Title: Foxit Reader Firefox Plugin npFoxitReaderPlugin Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow in the Foxit Reader Plugin npFoxitReaderPlugin that is exposed when loading PDF files from remote hosts with overly long query strings within the URL.

Title: Novell eDirectory ndsd Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in Novell eDirectory by sending a malformed packet to the 524/TCP port.

Title: Crystal Reports Viewer Activex Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in PrintControl.dll ActiveX control when processing the ServerResourceVersion property and can be exploited via an overly long string.

Title: BigAnt IM Server AntDS Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: BigAnt IM Server is prone to a buffer-overflow within AntDS.exe component when handling a specially crafted filename header.

Title: Elastix PBX Remote PHP Injection Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote PHP code injection vulnerability in Elastix PBX by uploading a renamed PHP file and leveraging a local file inclusion vulnerability to execute the PHP file. It also exploits a bad configuration in the /etc/sudoers file to elevate privileges from 'asterisk' user to 'root'.

Title: Adobe Flash Player ActiveX SWF Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player when parsing a specially crafted .SWF file, which can be leveraged to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable machines by convincing an unsuspecting user to visit a malicious web site.

Title: Tectia SSH Server Authentication Bypass Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The SSH USERAUTH CHANGE REQUEST feature in SSH Tectia Server on UNIX and Linux, when old-style password authentication is enabled, allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a crafted session involving entry of blank passwords.

Title: Advantech Studio ISSymbol ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: Buffer overflow in the ISSymbol ActiveX control in ISSymbol.ocx in Advantech Studio allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long String argument in the InternationalOrder method.This verions adds suppport for Internet Explorer 8 and 9 and Windows 7.

Title: Panda Internet Security Binary Planting Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a privilege escalation vulnerability in Panda Internet Security.

Title: Apple Mac OS X DirectoryService SwapProxyMessage Unchecked objOffset Remote DoS
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Mac OS X Directory Service Proxy by sending a crafted packet to port TCP 625, causing a denial of service effect.

Title: FreeBSD Kernel linux_ifconf Local Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a kernel memory corruption in the Linux compatibility layer.

Title: RealPlayer RealMedia File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: RealPlayer is prone to a stack based buffer overflow when opening specially crafted Real Media files.

Title: Oracle Java JMX Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The default Java security properties configuration does not restrict access to certain objects in the com.sun.jmx.mbeanserver packages. This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: IBM Director CIM Server Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: IBM Director is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability that affects the CIM server. Attackers can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges in the context of the CIM server process.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CButton Object Use After Free Exploit
Description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a use after free vulnerability caused by an object that was not properly allocated or is deleted.This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: IrfanView IMXCF Plugin Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow on IrfanView Formats plugin when parsing a specially crafted .XCF file.

Title: Apple QuickTime MIME Type Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow in the Apple QuickTime plugin allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted MIME type.

Title: WibuKey Runtime for Windows ActiveX Exploit
Description: The vulnerability exists within the WkWin32.dll module when processing the DisplayMessageDialog() method.

Title: Remote Exploits File Header Update
Description: This update only modifies the description in the file header.

Title: Microsoft Windows TrueType Font File Vulnerability DoS (MS12-075)
Description: This module causes a BSOD in Microsoft Windows when parsing a specially crafted .TTF font file.

Title: Novell File Reporter NFRAgent FSFUI Record File Upload Exploit
Description: This module exploits a Directory traversal vulnerability in NFRAgent.exe in Novell File Reporter. This allows remote attackers to upload and execute files via a 130 /FSF/CMD request with a .. (dot dot) in a FILE element of an FSFUI record. This vulnerability can be exploited remotely by sending a specially crafted packet to port TCP/3037.

Title: OP5 license Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: op5 Appliance contains an input validation flaw related to the system-portal component that allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary shell commands via command injection.

Title: WeBid converter Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: Input passed via the "from" and "to" POST parameters to converter.php is not properly sanitised before being stored in includes/currencies.php. This can be exploited to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code.
Exploit Platform: Solaris, Linux, Windows, Mac OS X

Title: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Service Format String Vulnerability DoS (MS12-054)
Description: This module exploits a format string vulnerability in Microsoft Windows "Print Spooler" service.

Title: VCMS Image Arbitrary Upload Exploit
Description: A unrestricted file upload vulnerability exists in includes/inline_image_upload.php within AutoSec Tools V-CMS 1.0. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension and then accessing it via a direct request to the file in temp.
Exploit Platform: Solaris, Linux, Windows, Mac OS X

Title: Xampp webdav PHP Upload Exploit
Description: This module attacks default XAMPP installations and abuses the use of default credentials for webdav. The module can also be configured to take advantage of user supplied credentials.

Title: Basilic diff PHP Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module abuses a metacharacter injection vulnerability in the diff.php script. This flaw allows an unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as the www-data user account.

Title: VMware ESX RetrieveProperties Remote DoS Update
Description: The VMware vSphere API contains a denial of service vulnerability. This issue allows an unauthenticated user to send a maliciously crafted API request and disable the host daemon. Exploitation of the issue would prevent management activities on the host but any virtual machines running on the host would be unaffected.This update adds the correct CVE number.

Title: Oracle Java JAX-WS Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The default Java security properties configuration did not restrict accessto certain com.sun.org.glassfish packages. This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: Apple QuickTime text3GTrack attribute TeXML Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: Buffer Overflow when handling an attribute of "text3GTrack" elements can be exploited when Quick Player handles a specially crafted TeXML file.This update adds the correct CVE information.

Title: VMware OVF Tool Format String Exploit
Description: Format String vulnerability in OVF Tool when parsing crafted OVF files.

Title: Apple QuickTime Style Elements TeXML Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: Buffer Overflow when handling an attribute of style elements can be exploited when Quick Player handles a specially crafted TeXML file.This update corrects CVE.

Title: Samba LsarSetInformationPolicy Request Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit Update 2
Description: This module exploits a heap overflow vulnerability in Samba Server by sending a crafted request packet via DCERPC call.This update adds support to Debian 5 (32 bits and 64 bits).

Title: AzeoTech DAQFactory NETB Datagram Parsing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A Buffer Overflow exist in DAQFactory service who listens on the UDP port 20034 when logs the informations of the incoming NETB packets.

Title: WebCalendar Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a command injection vulnerability in WebCalendar prior to 1.2.4 in order to install an agent.

Title: CYME ChartFX Client Server ActiveX Control Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to an indexing error in the ShowPropertiesDialog()method inside the ChartFX.ClientServer.Core.dll ActiveX Control. This can be exploited to write a single byte value to an arbitrary memory location via the pageNumber parameter.

Title: Invision Power Board Unserialize Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: Invision Power Board is vulnerable to a remote code execution due to the use of the unserialize method on user input passed through cookies without a proper sanitization.

Title: VisiWave Site Survey Report File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in VisiWave Site Survey Report when handling report files. This can be exploited to cause a stack based buffer overflow via a specially crafted .VWR file.This module bypass DEP using ROP techniques.This update adds CVE information.

Title: Avaya IP Office Customer Call Reporter ImageUpload Exploit
Description: The specific flaw exists because Avaya IP Office Customer Call Reporter allows to upload files to the webserver through ImageUpload.ashx. The uploaded files will not be stripped of their file extensions and the directory where they are saved has no scripting restrictions.

Title: VMware ESX RetrieveProperties Remote DoS
Description: A security vulnerability was found in the VMware vSphere Hypervisor (ESXi)subsystem, allowing an unauthenticated remote DoS. The vulnerability couldallow denial of service if a specially crafted request is sent to thevSphere API by an unauthenticated user.

Title: Novell ZENworks AdminStudio LaunchHelp ActiveX Arbitrary Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module allows remote attackers to place arbitrary files on a temporary folder in Novel ZENWorks AdminStudio, through a vulnerability in LaunchHelp.dll ActiveX Control (LaunchHelp.dll version 9.5.0.0). Code execution is achieved by uploading and executing a vbs script which then requests and executes Impact's binary agent.

Title: Apple QuickTime Style Elements TeXML Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Buffer Overflow when handling an attribute of style elements can be exploited when Quick Player handles a specially crafted TeXML file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: EMC NetWorker nsrd RPC Service Format String Exploit Update
Description: A Format string vulnerability in the nsrd RPC service within EMC NetWorker? allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in a crafted message.This update adds Linux Support.

Title: Apple QuickTime text3GTrack attribute TeXML Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Buffer Overflow when handling an attribute of "text3GTrack" elements can be exploited when Quick Player handles a specially crafted TeXML file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: NTR ActiveX Control StopModule Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the ntractivex118.dll module included in the NTRglobal NTR Activex Control application.  The exploit is triggered when the StopModule() method processes a crafted argument resulting in a buffer overflow.

Title: Aladdin Knowledge System Ltd PrivAgent ChooseFilePath Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Aladdin Knowledge System Ltd PrivAgent.ocx ActiveX Control. The exploit is triggered when the ChooseFilePath() method processes a long string argument resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow.

Title: HP Data Protector Express Create New Folder Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: HP Data Protector Express is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling folder names in an insecure way by the dpwindtb.dll component.

Title: HP Data Protector Express Opcode 0x330 Parsing Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: A buffer Overflow exists within the dpwinsdr.exe process which listens on TCP port 3817 by default. The process has insufficient bounds checking on user-supplied data copied to a fixed-length buffer on the stack. Remote, unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending malformed opcode 0x330 message packets to the target.

Title: HP Data Protector EXEC_CMD Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in HP Data Protector by sending a specially crafted EXEC_CMD request.This update fixes an issue when using InjectorEgg.

Title: Symantec Messaging Gateway SSH Support Account Exploit
Description: This module exploits a default password vulnerability in Symantec Messaging Gateway.

Title: EMC NetWorker nsrd RPC Service Format String Exploit
Description: A Format string vulnerability in the nsrd RPC service within EMC NetWorker? allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in a crafted message.

Title: Advantech Studio ISSymbol ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Buffer overflow in the ISSymbol ActiveX control in ISSymbol.ocx in Advantech Studio allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long String argument in the InternationalOrder method.

Title: Identity Viewer Protocol Fix
Description: This fixes a misspelling in the identity.xml file.

Title: EMC Replication Manager Client irccd.exe Misconfiguration Exploit
Description: The best practice for installations of EMC Replication Manager is to register a Replication Manager Client (irccd.exe) instance with the appropiate Replication Manager Server (ird.exe) as soon as the client software is installed on a host.Registration is performed by Replication Manager administrators from within the Replication Manager Server.

Title: Libdbus DBUS_SYSTEM_BUS_ADDRESS Variable Local Privilege Escalation
Description: Libdbus 1.5.x and earlier, when used in setuid processes not clearing the environment variables, allows local users to gain privileges and execute arbitrary code via the DBUS_SYSTEM_BUS_ADDRESS environment variable.

Title: SQL Injection Analyzer Update 2
Description: Test a web page's parameters trying to detect potential SQL Injection vulnerabilities.this update is for 12.5.

Title: Microsoft Windows Sysret Instruction Privilege Escalation Exploit (MS12-042) Update
Description: On Intel CPUs, sysret to non-canonical addresses causes a fault on the sysret instruction itself after the stack pointer is set to guest value but before the current privilege level (CPL) is changed. Windows is vulnerable due to the way the Windows User Mode Scheduler handles system requests. This module exploits the vulnerability and installs an agent with system privileges.This update fixes an issue in the documentation.

Title: GE Proficy Historian KeyHelp ActiveX LaunchTriPane Code Execution Exploit
Description: GE Proficy Historian is prone to a Code execution vulnerability in the KeyScript ActiveX control from keyhelp.ocx. The function LaunchTriPane use the -decompile option and can be abused to write arbitrary files on the remote system.

Title: Microsoft Windows Remote Desktop Protocol DoS (MS12-020) Update
Description: This update fixes the failure when running this module on multiple systems.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Keyboard Layout Vulnerability Exploit (MS12-047) Update
Description: This update adds support to Impact 12.5This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability by loading a fake keyboard layout through a call to "NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx" function with crafted parameters.When the keyboard layout is processed by win32k.sys, it produces a kernel heap memory corruption.

Title: HP SiteScope Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits two vulnerabilities in HP SiteScope to gain remote code execution. The first vulnerability is an authentication bypass in the getSiteScopeConfiguration operation available through the APISiteScopeImpl AXIS service to grab the administrator credentials from the server running HP SiteScope. The second vulnerability is a directory traversal in the UploadFileHandler url that allows to upload files to the server into a directory that allows for scripting.

Title: Microsoft Windows Sysret Instruction Privilege Escalation Exploit (MS12-042)
Description: On Intel CPUs, sysret to non-canonical addresses causes a fault on the sysret instruction itself after the stack pointer is set to guest value but before the current privilege level (CPL) is changed. Windows is vulnerable due to the way the Windows User Mode Scheduler handles system requests. This module exploits the vulnerability and installs an agent with root privileges.

Title: Samba LsarSetInformationPolicy Request Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: This update adds support to Debian 6.0.0 and adds support for attacking IPv6 targets.This module exploits a heap overflow bug in Samba Server by sending a crafted request packet via DCERPC call.

Title: Oracle Outside In XPM Image Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A Buffer Overflow exists in the Oracle Outside SDK when the XPM image processing method does not properly validate the length of chars_per_pixel string within XPM images. This suite is used for 3rd party applications like Quick View Plus.

Title: Cisco Linksys PlayerPT ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit Update 2
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the PlayerPT.ocx module included in the Cisco Linksys WVC200 Wireless-G PTZ Internet Video Camera application.  The exploit is triggered when the SetSource() method processes a crafted argument resulting in a buffer overflow.This update improves the xml of the module to be compatible with new product functionality.

Title: TurboFTP Server PORT Command Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: TurboFTP Server is prone to a buffer-overflow when processing a malformed PORT command.

Title: HP Lifecycle Management XGO ActiveX SetShapeNodeType Type Method Exploit
Description: Type Confusion vulnerability in XGO.ocx ActiveX control in HP Lifecycle Management in the method SetShapeNodeType allowing user-specified memory to be used as an object.

Title: Novell File Reporter NFRAgent PATH Tag Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability exists within NFRAgent.exe listening on TCP port 3037. When parsing tags inside the PATH element, the process performs insufficient bounds checking on user-supplied data prior to copying it on the stack.

Title: Novell File Reporter NFRAgent VOL Tag Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability exists within NFRAgent.exe listening on TCP port 3037. When parsing tags inside the VOL element, the process performs insufficient bounds checking on user-supplied data prior to copying it on the stack.

Title: HP Intelligent Management Center UAM sprintf Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A stack buffer overflow exists in HP Intelligent Management Center's uam.exe service which listens on port UDP/1811. The vulnerability is due to lack of validation of a string passed to sprintf.

Title: Microsoft Word MSCOMCTL TabStrip Control Use-after-free Exploit(MS12-060) Update
Description: A Memory Corruption in Microsoft Word is caused due to an error within the TabStrip ActiveX control (MSCOMCTL.OCX) object, embedded in a RTF crafted file.This update adds support for Impact 12.5.

Title: PHP apache_request_headers Function Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow in PHP. The specific flaw is in the apache_request_handlers() function. The apache_request_handlers() function fails to validate the length of certain headers in the HTTP request and blindly copy all the string received in the vulnerable header to the stack causing a buffer overflow.

Title: HP OpenView Performance Agent coda.exe Opcode 0x8C Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow exists in coda.exe process which listens on a random TCP port by default. The process trusts a value within a GET request as a size then proceeds to copy that many bytes of user-supplied data into a fixed-length buffer on the stack.

Title: Cisco Linksys PlayerPT ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the PlayerPT.ocx module included in the Cisco Linksys WVC200 Wireless-G PTZ Internet Video Camera application.  The exploit is triggered when the SetSource() method processes a crafted argument resulting in a buffer overflow.This update adds support for Internet Explorer 8 and 9 and Windows 7, detected automatically.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Exec Function Use After Free Exploit
Description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the CMshtmlEd::Exec function in mshtml.dll in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 through 9 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web site, as exploited in the wild in September 2012.This module runs a web server waiting for vulnerable clients to connect to it. When the client connects, it will try to install an agent by exploiting this vulnerability.This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Fixed Table Col Span Exploit (MS12-037)
Description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 8 is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability caused by an incorrect handling of the span attribute for col elements from a fixed table, when they are modified dynamically by javascript code.

Title: Internet Explorer Same ID Property Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 8 does not properly handle objects in memory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by accessing a deleted object.

Title: HP OpenView Performance Agent coda.exe Opcode 0x34 Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow exists in coda.exe process which listens on a random TCP port by default. The process trusts a value within a GET request as a size then proceeds to copy that many bytes of user-supplied data into a fixed-length buffer on the stack.

Title: Microsoft Word MSCOMCTL TabStrip Control Use-after-free Exploit(MS12-060)
Description: A Memory Corruption in Microsoft Word is caused due to an error within the TabStrip ActiveX control (MSCOMCTL.OCX) object, embedded in a RTF crafted file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator Local Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a privilege escalation vulnerability in Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator.

Title: Oracle Java Beans Statement Remote Code Execution Exploit Update
Description: An AccessControlContext attribute in the java.beans.Statement class of Oracle Java can be overwritten by unprivileged applets by using specially crafted Java Beans Expressions and Statements, even when the AccessControlContext attribute is declared as final.This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: FreeBSD NFS Client Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: The NFS client subsystem in FreeBSD fails to correctly validate the length of a parameter provided by the user when a filesystem is mounted. This may cause a kernel stack overflow that can be exploited by local users to gain root privileges.

Title: Oracle AutoVue ActiveX Control SetMarkupMode Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability found in the AutoVue.ocx ActiveX control due in strcpy function in the SetMarkupMode method, when handling a specially crafted sMarkup argument.

Title: Microsoft Visio Viewer DXF File Buffer Overflow Exploit (MS12-059)
Description: Microsoft Visio Viewer is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling specially crafted DXF files.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Linux Kernel compat_alloc_user_space Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: The "compat_alloc_user_space" function, which belongs to the 32-bit compatibility layer for 64-bit versions of Linux, can produce a stack pointer underflow when it's called with an arbitrary length input. This vulnerability can be used by local unprivileged users to corrupt the kernel memory in order to gain root privileges.

Title: Oracle Java Beans Statement Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: An AccessControlContext attribute in the java.beans.Statement class of Oracle Java can be overwritten by unprivileged applets by using specially crafted Java Beans Expressions and Statements, even when the AccessControlContext attribute is declared as final.This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: Ricoh DC DL-10 SR10 FTP USER Command Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Ricoh DC's DL-10 SR10 FTP Server is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability when handling data through the USER command. This can be exploited by supplying a long string of data to the affected command.

Title: Conficker Detector Exploit Update
Description: This module connects to a remote target via any exposed DCE RPCendpoints and fingerprints them to determine if the machine appears tobe compromised by the Conficker worm. This update adds RPT capabilities.

Title: Oracle Java Field Access Bytecode Verifier Cache Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: An error in the way the bytecode verifier of Java validates field access instructions when preparing to JIT-compile a method can be abused to cause a type confusion vulnerability. This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: Linux Kernel IA32 Syscall Emulation Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Linux for x86-64. The IA32 system call emulation functionality does not zero-extend the EAX register after the 32bit entry path to ptrace is used, which might allow local users to trigger an out-of-bounds access to the system call table using the RAX register and escalate privileges.This vulnerability is a regression of CVE-2007-4573.

Title: Xenorate XPL File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Xenorate is prone to a buffer-overflow. The program fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input with a specially crafted XPL file.

Title: Interactive Graphical SCADA System Command Injection Exploit
Description: This module exploits a command injection vulnerability in Interactive Graphical SCADA System and install an agent into the target machine.

Title: Csound hetro File Handling Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Buffer overflow in Csound exists when trying to import a malicious hetro file in tabular format. In order to achieve exploitation the user should import the malicious file through csound with a console command like:"csound -U het_import project.csd file.het".

Title: Samba LsarSetInformationPolicy Request Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a heap overflow bug in Samba Server by sending a crafted request packet via DCERPC call.

Title: IBM Lotus iNotes ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: IBM Lotus iNotes ActiveX control dwa85W.dll is vulnerable to a buffer overflow via a long argument to the Attachment_Times method.

Title: IBM Lotus Quickr qp2.cab ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow in the ActiveX control qp2.cab in IBM Lotus Quickr for Domino allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the Attachment_Times method.

Title: ALLMediaServer Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error within the handling of HTTP request.

Title: Apple QuickTime QTVR QTVRStringAtom Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: The vulnerability exists within the QuickTimeVR.qtx component when processing a QTVRStringAtom having an overly large "stringLength" parameter. This can be exploited to cause a based buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code under the context of the user running the application.This update adds support for Internet Explorer 6 and 8 and bypass DEP.Also allows to send the mov file by email to open it directly with QuickTimePlayer.

Title: SQL Injection Analyzer Update
Description: Test a web page's parameters trying to detect potential SQL Injection vulnerabilities.The module can be configured to look for vulnerabilities in GET & POST parameters and cookies.This update adds an additional trigger to the FAST set of SQL injection triggers for the SQL Injection analyzer to use.

Title: Simple Web Server GET Request Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error within Simple Web Server when processing HTTP GET Request. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via an overly long, specially-crafted argument passed to the affected command.

Title: Symantec Web Gateway blocked_file.php Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The spywall/blocked_file.php script of Symantec Web Gateway allows remote unauthenticated users to upload files with arbitrary extensions. This can be abused by attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code on vulnerable systems.

Title: FlexNet License Server Manager lmgrd Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A stack buffer overflow exist in FlexNet License Server Manager due to the insecure usage of memcpy in the lmgrd service when handling crafted network packets.

Title: FireFly Media Server Remote Format String Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote format string vulnerability in FireFly Media Server by sending a sequence of HTTP requests to the 3689/TCP port.

Title: IrfanView JPEG2000 Plugin Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to an error when processing qcd chunk structure.

Title: SugarCRM CE unserialize PHP Code Execution Exploit
Description: The vulnerability  is  caused  by scripts using "unserialize()" with user controlled input. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary PHP code via the  "__destruct()" method of the "SugarTheme" class or passing an  ad-hoc serialized object through the $_REQUEST['current_query_by_page'] input variable.

Title: IBM Cognos tm1admsd Multiple Operations Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This vulnerability exists within the tm1admsd.exe component Of IBM Cognos TM1. This process listens on TCP port 5498 by default. Multiple opcodes fail to validate user supplied length and data fields before copying their contents to a fixed length buffer on the stack.

Title: Oracle Java AtomicReferenceArray Type Confusion Exploit Update
Description: Unsafe type handling performed by the AtomicReferenceArray class of the Oracle Java Runtime Environment can be abused to cause a type confusion error.This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Keyboard Layout Vulnerability Exploit (MS12-047)
Description: This update replaces the exploit modules for MS12-034. Also it adds support for 64bit versions of Microsoft Windows 2003, Vista and 2008.This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability by loading a fake keyboard layout through a call to "NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx" function with crafted parameters.When the keyboard layout is processed by win32k.sys, it produces a kernel heap memory corruption.

Title: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Service Impersonation Exploit (MS10-061) Update 3
Description: This update adds support to Microsoft Windows 2003 64 bits, Microsoft Windows Vista 64 bits, Microsoft Windows 2008 64 bits and Microsoft Windows Seven 64 bits.This module exploits a vulnerability in the "Print Spooler" service.

Title: Microsoft Windows Remote Desktop Protocol DoS (MS12-036)
Description: This modules exploits a kernel vulnerability in Microsoft Remote Desktop server by sending a sequence of specially crafted RDP packets to the target system.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in somesituations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugsor have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: PAC-Designer File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error when processing thetags within .PAC files. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via an overly long string.This update adds CVE number.

Title: FreeBSD Sysret Instruction Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: On Intel CPUs, sysret to non-canonical addresses causes a fault on the sysret instruction itself after the stack pointer is set to guest value but before the current privilege level (CPL) is changed. FreeBSD is vulnerable to this issue due to insufficient sanity checks when returning from a system call. This module exploits the vulnerability and installs an agent with root privileges.

Title: Netmechanica NetDecision HTTP Server Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: A buffer overflow in NetDecision's HTTP service is exploited when a long URL is managed by the HTTP Server's active window. For successfull exploitation, the victim need to have the HttpSvr's window open.This version add CVE.

Title: Apple QuickTime TeXML Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: A vulnerability found in Apple QuickTime Player when handling a crafted TeXML file, it is possible to trigger a stack-based buffer overflow.This update bypass DEP for Internet Explorer 8 support and for execute the mov file directly in Quicktime player.

Title: Adobe Flash Player _error Object Confusion Exploit
Description: This module exploits an object type confusion vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player. The specific error occurs due to the way Adobe Flash handles the AMF0 response (_error) when connecting to a malicious RTMP server. By supplying a crafted AMF0 response it is possible to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer XML Core Services MSXML Uninitialized Memory Exploit
Description: Microsoft XML Core Services 3.0, 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0, as used by Internet Explorer, accesses uninitialized memory locations, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by enticing an unsuspecting user to visit a specially crafted web site.

Title: Symantec Web Gateway PHP Injection Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote code execution vulnerability in Symantec Web Gateway by using a log injection and a local file inclusion to run an arbitrary PHP script.

Title: Apple QuickTime TeXML Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A vulnerability found in Apple QuickTime Player when handling a crafted TeXML file, it is possible to trigger a stack-based buffer overflow.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: IrfanView Formats Plugin TTF File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error within the Formats plug-in (Formats.dll) when handling TFF files. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted TFF file.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Object Memory Corruption Exploit (MS10-002)
Description: This module exploits a use-after-free vulnerability in the MSHTML component in Internet Explorer. The specific error ocurrs due to the way Internet Explorer handles objects in memory. It is possible to use a pointer in CTableRowCellsCollectionCacheItem::GetNext after it gets freed and get remote code execution.This vulnerability was one of the 2012's Pwn2Own challenges.

Title: EZHomeTech EzServer Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: EzServer is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling packets with an overly long string.

Title: Apple Itunes M3U File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Apple Itunes is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling M3U files with an overly long string.

Title: ABB Robot Communications Runtime Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow exists in a component of the Robot Communication Runtime used in some ABB programs for the communications to the IRC5, IRC5C, and IRC5P robot controllers.This version add CVE.

Title: VLC Media Player libmodplug Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: VLC Media Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of user supplied data. An attacker is able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user when opening malicious .S3M media files.This version adds the CVE number.

Title: PHP-CGI Argument Injection Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits an argument injection vulnerability in PHP up to version 5.3.12 and 5.4.2 when running as a standalone CGI processor and takes advantage of the -d flag to achieve remote code execution.This update adds support for FreeBSD, OpenBSD, RedHat and Windows platforms.

Title: Asterisk HTTP Digest DoS
Description: This module triggers a stack corruption vulnerability in Asterisk by sending a malformed packet to the 8088/TCP port.

Title: Diamond Programmer XCF File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Diamond Programmer is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling specially crafted XCF files with an overly long string.

Title: VideoSpirit Pro Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: VideoSpirit Pro is prone to a buffer overflow when parsing a .VISPRJ project file that contains an overly long "MP3" value. The vulnerability is caused due to a wrong check of the data before it is passed to strcpy(). This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted .VISPRJ file.This update adds the CVE number.

Title: GIMP script-fu Server Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: There is a buffer overflow in the script-fu server component of GIMP(the GNU Image Manipulation Program) when sending a crafted package to the port 10008.

Title: MicroP MPPL File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: MicroP is prone to a buffer-overflow when handling MPPL files with an overly long string.

Title: Cisco Linksys PlayerPT ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the PlayerPT.ocx module included in the Cisco Linksys WVC200 Wireless-G PTZ Internet Video Camera application.  The exploit is triggered when the SetSource() method processes a crafted argument resulting in a buffer overflow.

Title: RabidHamster R4 Log Entry sprintf Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A stack overflow found in RabidHamster R4's web server by supplying a malformed HTTP request when generating a log.

Title: Apple QuickTime QTVR QTVRStringAtom Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability exists within the QuickTimeVR.qtx component when processing a QTVRStringAtom having an overly large "stringLength" parameter. This can be exploited to cause a based buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code under the context of the user running the application.

Title: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software ActiveX Buffer Overflow Exploit Update 2
Description: A flaw exists within the way the IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software ActiveX Control parses data supplied to the RunAndUploadFile function. The ActiveX control is used to create an Asset Information file for the local system to be uploaded to the IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express Server.This update corrects the CVE number, adds support for Internet Explorer 8 and disables DEP.This update improves the exploit.

Title: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software ActiveX Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: A flaw exists within the way the IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software ActiveX Control parses data supplied to the RunAndUploadFile function. The ActiveX control is used to create an Asset Information file for the local system to be uploaded to the IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express Server.This update corrects the CVE number, adds support for Internet Explorer 8 and disables DEP.

Title: Adobe Photoshop Collada Asset Elements Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Adobe Photoshop CS5.1 is prone to a unicode overflow which occurs when overlong asset elements are processed.

Title: AT TFTP Server Long Filename Buffer Overflow Exploit Update 2
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error during the processing of TFTP Read/Write request packet types. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow by sending a specially crafted packet with an overly long filename field.This update ensures that the program receives all data.This update fixes an error on Impact v12.3.

Title: MSRPC DCOM Exploit Update 2
Description: This Update adds MS03-026 in XML.

Title: Samba Username Map Script Command Injection Exploit Update
Description: The MS-RPC functionality in smbd in Samba 3.0.0 through 3.0.25rc3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters involving the SamrChangePassword function, when the "username map script" smb.conf option is enabled.This update adds Solaris support.

Title: OpenSSH unexpected PAM authentication exploit Update
Description: This module exploits an error in the PAM authentication code and installs an agent into the target host.This update improves the reliability of the exploit.

Title: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management Preboot Service Opcode 0x21 Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the Preboot Service component of Novell ZENworks Configuration Management, by sending a specially crafted packet to the port 998/TCP.

Title: HP Data Protector EXEC_CMD Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in HP Data Protector by sending a specially crafted EXEC_CMD request.

Title: HP Easy Printer Care XMLCacheMgr Class ActiveX Control Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module allows remote attackers to place arbitrary files on a users file system by abusing the "CacheDocumentXMLWithId" method from the "XMLCacheMgr" class in the HP Easy Printer HPTicketMgr.dll ActiveX Control (HPTicketMgr.dll 2.7.2.0). Code execution can be achieved by first uploading the payload to the remote machine embeddeding a vbs file, and then upload another mof file, which enables Windows Management Instrumentation service to execute the vbs.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Keyboard Layout Vulnerability Exploit (MS12-034) Update 6
Description: This update adds support to Microsoft Windows 2003 64 bits edition ( DoS ), Microsoft Windows Vista 64 bits edition ( DoS ), Microsoft Windows 2008 64 bits edition ( DoS ) and Microsoft Windows Seven 64 bits edition ( DoS ).This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability by loading a fake keyboard layout through a call to "NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx" function with crafted parameters.When the keyboard layout is processed by win32k.sys, it produces a kernel heap memory corruption.

Title: CyberLink Power2Go P2G Name Attribute Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A stack-based buffer overflow in CyberLink Power2Go allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code via an overly long name attribute in a .P2G file.

Title: LANDesk Lenovo ThinkManagement Console Remote Command Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a file upload vulnerability in the LANDesk Lenovo ThinkManagement Console. Unrestricted file upload in andesk/managementsuite/core/core.anonymous/ServerSetup.asmx in the ServerSetup web service in Lenovo ThinkManagement Console allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension via a PutUpdateFileCore command in a RunAMTCommand SOAP request.

Title: NET-i Viewer CNC Ctrl dll ActiveX BackupToAvi() Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in the CNC_Ctrl.dll ActiveX control when handling the BackupToAvi() method.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Keyboard Layout Vulnerability Exploit (MS12-034) Update 4
Description: This update adds support to Microsoft Windows Vista and Microsoft Windows 7 ( only DoS ).This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability by loading a fake keyboard layout through a call to "NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx" function with crafted parameters.When the keyboard layout is processed by win32k.sys, it produces a kernel heap memory corruption.

Title: PAC-Designer File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error when processing thetags within .PAC files. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via an overly long string.

Title: 3D Life Player WebPlayer ActiveX Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A boundary error exists in the WebPlayer ActiveX control when processing the "SRC" property with an overly long string.

Title: ispVM System XCF File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in ispVM when processing crafted .XCF files can be exploited via an overly long version value within the ispXCF tag.

Title: HP Easy Printer Care XMLSimpleAccessor Class ActiveX Control Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module allows remote attackers to place arbitrary files on a users file system by abusing the "saveXML" method from the "XMLSimpleAccessor" class in the HP Easy Printer HPTicketMgr.dll ActiveX Control (HPTicketMgr.dll 2.7.2.0). Code execution can be achieved by first uploading the payload to the remote machine embedding a vbs file, and then upload another mof file, which enables Windows Management Instrumentation service to execute the vbs.

Title: McAfee Virtual Technician MVTControl ActiveX Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in McAfee Virtual Technician MVTControl, which can be abused by using the GetObject() function to load unsafe classes, therefore allowing remote code execution under the context of the user.

Title: Oracle Outside In sccfut dll Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The flaw exists within the sccfut.dll component which is used bymultiple vendors. The process copies the target of a crafted tag to a local stack buffer.

Title: SAP Netweaver DiagTraceR3Info Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The DiagTraceR3Info function of the disp+work.exe component of SAP Netweaver is prone to a remote buffer overflow when the work process trace level is set to values 2 or 3 for the Dialog Processor component. This vulnerability can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable machine by sending a specially crafted packet containing ST_R3INFO CODEPAGE items.

Title: IBM Rational ClearQuest RegisterSchemaRepoFromFileByDbSet ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: IBM Rational ClearQuest ActiveX control Cqole.dll is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by a function prototype mismatch in the RegisterSchemaRepoFromFileByDbSet() function.

Title: Citrix Gateway ActiveX Nsepa Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in the NSEPA.NsepaCtrl.1 ActiveX control in Nsepa.ocx in Citrix Access Gateway Enterprise Edition. When the control processes a crafted HTTP header data, a stack based buffer overflow occurs allowing execution of arbitrary code.

Title: CA Total Defense UNCWS Web Service DeleteReports Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The UNCWS Web Service component of CA Total Defense listens for SOAP requests. The DeleteReports method makes use of the uncsp_DeleteReports stored procedure, which is vulnerable to SQL Injection. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable machine with SYSTEM privileges.

Title: CA Total Defense UNCWS Web Service deleteReportFilter  Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The UNCWS Web Service component of CA Total Defense listens for SOAP requests. The deleteReportFilter method makes use of the uncsp_DeleteFilter stored procedure, which is vulnerable to SQL Injection.

Title: CA Total Defense UNCWS Web Service deleteReportFilter Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The UNCWS Web Service component of CA Total Defense listens for SOAP requests. The deleteReportFilter method makes use of the uncsp_DeleteFilter stored procedure, which is vulnerable to SQL Injection.

Title: VLC MMS Stream Handling Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A Stack-based buffer overflow in VideoLAN VLC media player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted MMS:// stream.

Title: Microsoft Windows OLE Property Code Execution Exploit (MS11-093)
Description: Microsoft Windows does not properly handle OLE objects in memory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted object within a file.

Title: ASUS Net4Switch ipswcom ActiveX Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: ASUS Net4Switch is prone to an overflow condition related to the ActiveX component ipswcom.dll. The CxDbgPrint()function (cxcmrt.dll) fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input resulting in a buffer overflow. With a specially crafted message string passed to the Alert() method, a remote attacker can potentially execute arbitrary code.

Title: Dell Webcam CrazyTalk4Native.dll ActiveX Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The CrazyTalk4Native.dll bundled with Dell Webcam Central is prone to a buffer overflow which is exploited by this module.

Title: Shadow Stream Recorder Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Shadow Stream Recorder is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the applications fail to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Keyboard Layout Vulnerability Exploit (MS12-034) Update 3
Description: This update adds support to Microsoft Windows XP with the MS12-034 patch installed.This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability by loading a fake keyboard layout through a call to "NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx" function with crafted parameters.When the keyboard layout is processed by win32k.sys, it produces a kernel heap memory corruption.

Title: OpenKM scripting Command Injection Exploit
Description: OpenKM allows administrative users (those having the AdminRole) to run bean shell scripts. Due to this permission an attacker could lure an OpenKM administrator to a malicious web page that causes arbitrary OS commands to run in the administrators OpenKM session context.

Title: TRENDnet SecurView Internet Camera UltraMJCam OpenFileDlg Buffer Overflow Exploit
