Description: A vulnerability exists in TRENDnet SecurView Internet Camera's ActiveX control that can be exploited by sending a long string of data to the OpenFileDlg() function.

Title: Microsoft Windows MSCOMCTL Exploit (MS12-027) Update
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in the MSCOMCTL.OCX control by sending a specially crafted .RTF file.This update fixes an issue in the agent connector.

Title: PHP-CGI Argument Injection Exploit
Description: This module exploits an argument injection vulnerability in PHP up to version 5.3.12 and 5.4.2 when running as a standalone CGI processor and takes advantage of the -d flag to achieve remote code execution.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Linux Sing Log Injection Local Exploit
Description: SING is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability, that allows an unprivileged process to elevate privileges to root.

Title: Quest InTrust AnnotateX ActiveX Exploit
Description: A vulnerability exists in AnnotateX.dll - by invoking the Add() method itis possible to call inside of any memory region of choice as selected by anattacker.

Title: MPlayer SAMI Subtitle File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in MPlayer. A stack-based buffer overflow in the sub_read_line_sami function in MPlayer SVN Versions before 33471 and SMPlayer 0.6.9 and older versions allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a SAMI subtitle file.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Keyboard Layout Vulnerability Exploit (MS12-034) Update 2
Description: This update adds support to Microsoft Windows 2008.This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability by loading a fake keyboard layout through a call to "NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx" function with crafted parameters.When the keyboard layout is processed by win32k.sys, it produces a kernel heap memory corruption.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k Keyboard Layout Vulnerability Exploit (MS12-034)
Description: This module exploits a Windows kernel vulnerability by loading a fake keyboard layout through a call to "NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx" function with crafted parameters.When the keyboard layout is processed by win32k.sys, it produces a kernel heap memory corruption.

Title: NetOp Remote Control Client Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A stack-based buffer overflow can be exploited in NetOp Remote Control when opening a crafted .dws file with a string longer then 520 characters.

Title: LotusCMS router PHP Command Injection Exploit
Description: Input passed via the "page" parameter to index.php is not properly sanitised in the "Router()" function in core/lib/router.php before being used in an "eval()" call. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary PHP code.

Title: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management Preboot Service Opcode 0x4c Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer-overflow vulnerability exists in the PreBoot Service when processing requests containing opcode 0x4c.

Title: Adobe Reader Font SING Table Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: This update fixes an error which made the module abort.

Title: Miniserv Perl Format String Exploit Update
Description: This update fixes an issue with the SSL support in the exploit for Usermin's and Webmin's perl format string vulnerability (CVE-2005-3912).

Title: Microsoft Office Excel RTD Data Record Processing Stack Overwrite Exploit (MS11-021) Update 2
Description: The flaw exists within the methods used for RealTimeData Record Parsing. When handling a stTopic field that has a bit set specifying double byte characters in the following field the value of a global pointer is improperly calculated.This version adds Windows 7 support and updates the CVE number.

Title: Atlassian FishEye Struts 2 ExceptionDelegator Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The ExceptionDelegator component of the XWork framework, part of the Apache Struts 2 web framework, as shipped with Atlassian FishEye, interprets parameters values as OGNL expressions when handling a type conversion error.This can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server by tricking a logged-in user with administrator privileges within the FishEye site to visit a specially crafted web page.

Title: Microsoft Windows MSCOMCTL Exploit (MS12-027)
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in the MSCOMCTL.OCX control by sending a specially crafted .RTF file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugsor have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Netmechanica NetDecision HTTP Server Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow in NetDecision's HTTP service is exploited when a long URL is managed by the HTTP Server's active window. For successfull exploitation, the victim need to have the HttpSvr's window open.

Title: SolarWinds Storage Manager Server SQL Injection Authentication Bypass Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the SolarWinds Storage Manager Server. The LoginServlet page available on port 9000 is vulnerable to SQL injection via the loginName field. An attacker can send a specially crafted username and execute arbitrary SQL commands leading to remote code execution.

Title: Adobe Flash Player MP4 cprt Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A memory corruption vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code sending a crafted MP4 file.

Title: Sysax Multi Server SSH Username Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack based buffer overflow on Sysax Multi Server when parsing an overly long username at the beginning of an SSH session.

Title: Oracle Java AtomicReferenceArray Type Confusion Exploit
Description: Unsafe type handling performed by the AtomicReferenceArray class of the Oracle Java Runtime Environment can be abused to cause a type confusion error.This flaw allows an unprivileged Java applet to escape the sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the target machine with the privileges of the current user.

Title: CA Total Defense UNCWS Web Service exportReport  Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The UNCWS Web Service component of CA Total Defense listens for SOAP requests. The exportReport method makes use of the uncsp_GenerateReports_Dashboard stored procedure, which is vulnerable to SQL Injection. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable machine with SYSTEM privileges.

Title: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software ActiveX Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The specific flaw exists within the way the ActiveX Control parses data supplied to the RunAndUploadFile function. The ActiveX control is used to create an Asset Information file for the local system to be uploaded to the IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express Server.

Title: PAM Motd Privilege Escalation Exploit Update
Description: The PAM MOTD module in Ubuntu does not correctly handle path permissions when creating user file stamps. A local attacker can exploit this to gain root privileges.This update improves the reliability of the exploit.

Title: CA Total Defense UNCWS Web Service exportReport Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The UNCWS Web Service component of CA Total Defense listens for SOAP requests. The exportReport method makes use of the uncsp_GenerateReports_Dashboard stored procedure, which is vulnerable to SQL Injection. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable machine with SYSTEM privileges.

Title: IBM Personal Communications Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: IBM Personal Communications is prone to a stack based buffer overflow when parsing a malformed WS file. This module exploits this flaw to archive a clientside code execution.

Title: AT TFTP Server Long Filename Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error during the processing of TFTP Read/Write request packet types. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow by sending a specially crafted packet with an overly long filename field.This update ensures that the program receives all data.

Title: Kingview SCADA HMI HistorySvr Heap Overflow Exploit Update
Description: KingView Scada is vulnerable to a buffer overflow error in the HistorySvr.exe module when processing malformed packets sent to port 777/TCP.This update adds new indirection using shell32.dll version 6.0.0.2900.5512.

Title: Microsoft Expression Design wintab32 DLL Hijacking Exploit (MS12-022)
Description: Microsoft Expression Design is prone to a vulnerability that may allow the execution of any library file named wintab32.dll, if this dll is located in the same folder than a .DESIGN file.This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module.It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Microsoft Windows Remote Desktop Protocol DoS (MS12-020)
Description: This module triggers a memory corruption vulnerability in the Remote Desktop Service by sending a malformed packet to the 3389/TCP port.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in somesituations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugsor have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Linux mem_write Local Privilege Escalation
Description: Due to insuficient checks when accessing the memory of a process vi /proc/PID/mem the linux kernel is prone to a privilige escalation.

Title: Oracle Java Web Start  XXaltjvm Option Command Line Injection Exploit
Description: Argument injection vulnerability in the URI handler in Java Deployment Toolkit allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the -J argument to javaws.exe, which is processed by the launch method.

Title: Oracle Java Web Start XXaltjvm Option Command Line Injection Exploit
Description: Argument injection vulnerability in the URI handler in Java Deployment Toolkit allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the -J argument to javaws.exe, which is processed by the launch method.

Title: Computer Associates eTrust Secure Content Manager DoS
Description: The eCS component (ECSQdmn.exe) in CA ETrust Secure Content Manager 8.0 and CA Gateway Security 8.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted request to port 1882, involving an incorrect integer calculation and a heap-based buffer overflow.

Title: Citrix Provisioning Services Streamprocess Opcodes Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in the streamprocess.exe service included in the Citrix Provisioning Services application by sending a malformed packet to the 6905/UDP port.This module adds support for Windows 2003.

Title: Android Webkit Floating Point Datatype Exploit
Description: WebKit in Android 2.1 does not properly validate floating-point data, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted HTML document, related to non-standard NaN representation.

Title: Motorola Netopia netOctopus SDCS Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in the Motorola Netopia netOctopus SDCS server service.The vulnerability exists within the code responsible for parsing client requests. When reading in a request from the network, a 32-bit integer is read in that specifies the number of bytes that follow. This value is not validated, and is then used to read data into a fixed-size stack buffer. This results in an exploitable stack buffer overflow.

Title: Java MixerSequencer Object GM_Song Structure Handling Exploit
Description: This vulnerability exists within the handling of MixerSequencer objects. When this object is used to play a MIDI file, the GM_Song structure is populated with song data. In particular, it stores a integer value from the file and uses it later as an index into an array of function pointers. If this value is over 128 the process can be made to call a pointer outside the array.

Title: Linux IGMPv3 DoS
Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernels IPv4 IGMP query processing. This module exploit this to cause a denial of service.

Title: CA iTechnology iGateway Debug Mode Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The CA iGateway component, contains a buffer overflow vulnerability due to improper bounds checking on HTTP GET requests by the iGateway component when debug mode is enabled.

Title: Microsoft Windows Media Player MIDI Heap Overflow Exploit (MS12-004) Update
Description: This module exploits a heap overflow in Windows Media Player (winmm.dll) when handling a specially crafted MIDI file.

Title: Trend Micro Control Manager CmdProcessor.exe AddTask Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The CmdProcessor.exe service of Trend Micro Control Manager is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow, which can be exploited by remote unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IPC packet to the vulnerable service.

Title: Apache Range Header DoS Update
Description: A denial of service vulnerability has been found in the way the multipleoverlapping ranges are handled by the Apache HTTPD server.This update fixes an issue when launching the module from an agent runningin a Linux system.

Title: SlimFTPd LIST Command Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: SlimFTPd server is prone to a stack buffer overflow when sending a LIST command with an overly-long argument. The attacker needs to be authenticated, so a successful login is required for the exploit to work.

Title: Sunway Force Control SCADA SMNP NetDBServer Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A stack based buffer overflow in the SNMP NetDBServer service of Sunway Forcecontrol is triggered when sending an overly long string to the listening service on port 2001.

Title: Microsoft ASP.NET Hash Table Collisions DoS (MS11-100) Update
Description: This module sends HTTP requests with specially crafted data making the ASP.NET subsystem consume lot of resources. This attack prevents the victim server from processing requests from legitimate clients and probably will make the server non-operational.This update fixes an issue when launching the module from an agent running in a Linux system.

Title: Traq Command Injection Exploit
Description: Traq is vulnerable to an authentication bypass vulnerability, this module exploits this vulnerability in order to install a plugin hook to ultimately install an agent in the target host.
Exploit Platform: Windows, Solaris, Linux, Mac OS X

Title: Adobe Flash Player MP4 SequenceParameterSetNALUnit Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability when handling MP4 files that lead to code execution.

Title: NetTerm NetFTPD USER Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: An internal memory buffer may be overrun while handling long "USER" command. This condition may be exploited by attackers to ultimately execute instructions with the privileges of the NetTerm NetFTPD.exe process.

Title: Symantec PCAnywhere awhost32 Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The flaw exists within the awhost32 component which is used when handling incoming connections. This process listens on TCP port 5631. When handling an authentication request the process copies the user supplied username unsafely to a fixed-length buffer.

Title: TFTPServer SP RRQ Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: TFTP Server is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before storing it in a finite-sized buffer.

Title: Oracle Java SSL Chosen Plain Text Exploit
Description: The SSL protocol encrypts data by using CBC mode with chained initialization vectors, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain plaintext HTTP headers via a blockwise chosen-boundary attack on an HTTPS session.This module attacks the SSLv3 implementation in the Oracle Java Runtime Enviroment. The module is capable of obtaining encrypted cookies from browsers running the affected Java Runtimes.

Title: PHP Hash Table Collisions DoS Update
Description: This module sends HTTP requests with specially crafted data making thePHP interpreter to consume lot of resources. This attack prevents thevictim server from processing requests from legitimate clients andprobably will make the server non-operational.This is update fixes an issue when launching the module from an agent running in a linux system.
Exploit Platform: Solaris, AIX, Windows, Linux, OpenBSD, FreeBSD

Title: Plone popen2 Remote Command Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote command execution vulnerability in the Zope web application server used by Plone, by sending a specially crafted HTTP request to the affected web site.The vulnerability exists because it is possible to remotely invoke the popen2 function from the Python os package with arbitrary arguments in the context of the affected server. This can be exploited by remote unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable machine.

Title: Omni-NFS Enterprise FTP Server Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: This vulnerability is caused by a buffer overflow in Omni-NFS Enterprise FTP Server, due to its lack of checking of user-supplied data within FTP requests.This update add CVE.

Title: Aviosoft DTV Player PLF File Buffer Overflow
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow in Aviosoft DTV Player which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted .plf (aka playlist) file.

Title: Microsoft Windows Media Player MIDI Heap Overflow Exploit (MS12-004)
Description: This module exploits a heap overflow in Windows Media Player (winmm.dll) when handling a specially crafted .MID file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Omni-NFS Server NFSD Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A buffer overflow exist in nfsd.exe in XLink Omni-NFS Server and allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted TCP packet to port 2049 (nfsd).

Title: Citrix Provisioning Services Streamprocess Opcodes Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in the streamprocess.exe service included in the Citrix Provisioning Services application by sending a malformed packet to the 6905/UDP port.

Title: Altarsoft Audio Converter WAV File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Altarsoft Audio Converter is prone to a buffer overflow when parsing malformed WAV files.

Title: Citrix Provisioning Services Streamprocess Opcodes Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in the streamprocess.exe service included in the Citrix Provisioning Services application by sending a malformed packet to the 6905/UDP port.

Title: Altarsoft Audio Converter WAV File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Altarsoft Audio Converter is prone to a buffer overflow when parsing malformed WAV files.

Title: Goodtech Telnet Daemon Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in the administration web server for GoodTech Telnet Server which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long string to port 2380.

Title: Microsoft Windows Object Packager Insecure Executable Loading Exploit (MS12-002)
Description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Windows registers and uses the Windows Object Packager that may allow the execution of any executable file named packager.exe, if this executable is located in the same folder than a .PPSX file.

Title: InduSoft Web Studio ISSymbol ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the ISSymbol.ocx control included in the InduSoft Web Studio ActiveX application.  The exploit is triggered when the OpenScreen() method processes a long string argument resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow.

Title: InduSoft Web Studio CEServer Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The flaw exists in the Remote Agent (CEServer.exe) that listens by default on TCP port 4322, the process can not perform any authentication and copy the packages designed to a fixed size buffer.

Title: PHP Hash Table Collisions DoS
Description: This module sends HTTP requests with specially crafted data making thePHP interpreter to consume lot of resources. This attack prevents thevictim server from processing requests from legitimate clients andprobably will make the server non-operational.
Exploit Platform: Solaris, AIX, Windows, Linux, OpenBSD, FreeBSD

Title: Adobe Reader ICC Chunk Parsing Integer Overflow Exploit
Description: An integer overflow occurs when Adobe Reader parses some crafted ICC chunks.

Title: Microsoft ASP.NET Hash Table Collisions DoS (MS11-100)
Description: This module sends HTTP requests with specially crafted data making the ASP.NET subsystem consume lot of resources. This attack prevents the victim server from processing requests from legitimate clients and probably will make the server non-operational.

Title: Microsoft Windows TrueType Font Parsing Vulnerability Local Exploit (MS11-087)
Description: This module exploits a Windows kernel heap overflow vulnerability when a crafted TTF file is processed by Windows kernel.

Title: Microsoft Office Assembly Execution Exploit (MS12-005)
Description: Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in the Windows Packager configuration allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted ClickOnce application in a Microsoft Office document.warning: "This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation."

Title: Telnetd encrypt_keyid Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit  Update
Description: A buffer overflow in libtelnet/encrypt.c in Inetutils and Heimdal implementations of telnetd allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with root permissions via a long encryption key.This update adds support for Debian and newer FreeBSD platforms.

Title: AVID Media Composer Phonetic Indexer Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Avid Media Composer is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability within the Phonetic Indexer (AvidPhoneticIndexer.exe) because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

Title: Telnetd encrypt_keyid Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: A buffer overflow in libtelnet/encrypt.c in Inetutils and Heimdal implementations of telnetd allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with root permissions via a long encryption key. This update adds support for Debian and newer FreeBSD platforms.

Title: Citrix Provisioning Services Streamprocess Opcode 0x40020000 Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote buffer overflow in the streamprocess.exe service included in the Citrix Provisioning Services application by sending a malformed packet to the 6905/UDP port.

Title: Novell ZENworks Asset Management Path Traversal Exploit
Description: This module exploits a path traversal vulnerability in Novell ZENworks Asset Management.The flaw exists within the rtrlet component. This process listens on TCP port 8080. When handling an unauthenticated file upload the process does not properly sanitize the path. Directory traversal can be used to drop a file in an arbitrary location and a null byte inserted into the filename to provide arbitrary extension.

Title: Microsoft Windows TrueType Font Parsing Vulnerability DoS (MS11-087) Update
Description: This update adds support to Microsoft Windows Vista, Microsoft Windows 2008 and Microsoft Windows 7.When a crafted TTF file is processed by Windows kernel it produces a stack exhaustion finishing it in a BSoD.

Title: Safari File Policy Exploit
Description: A policy issue existed in Apple Safari before 5.1 when handling of file:// URLs.

Title: CyberLink Power2Go dwmapi DLL Hijacking Exploit Update
Description: CyberLink Power2Go is prone to a vulnerability that may allow the execution of any library file named dwmapi.dll, if this dll is located in the same folder than a .P2G file.

Title: DameWare Mini Remote Control Username Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in DameWare Mini Remote Control by sending a specially crafted packet to port 6129/TCP.

Title: Microsoft Windows TrueType Font Parsing Vulnerability Clientside DoS (MS11-087)
Description: When a crafted TTF file is processed by Windows kernel it produces a stack exhaustion finishing it in a BSoD.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Description: Buffer overflow in libtelnet/encrypt.c in various implementations of telnetd allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with root permissions via a long encryption key.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: CoDeSys SCADA Webserver Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: webserver.exe is a component in 3S CoDeSys for handling the HTTP connections on port 8080.The process is affected by a buffer overflow that copies the input URI in a limited buffer allowing code execution.

Title: Microsoft Windows TrueType Font Parsing Vulnerability DoS (MS11-087)
Description: When a crafted TTF file is processed by Windows kernel it produces a stack exhaustion finishing it in a BSoD.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Microsoft Windows Font Library File Buffer Overrun Vulnerability Exploit (MS11-077) Update
Description: This update adds support to Microsoft Windows Vista and Microsoft Windows 2008.When a crafted ".fon" file is loaded by Windows Kernel this produces a kernel heap overflow.This module exploits this vulnerability by filling the kernel memory via heap spraying and building a fake chunk header.

Title: TinyIdentD Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is a buffer overflow in TinyIdentD via a long string to TCP port 113.

Title: Phpldapadmin orderby Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: Input passed to the "orderby" parameter in cmd.php (when "cmd" is set to "query_engine", "query" is set to "none", and "search" is set to e.g. "1") is not properly sanitised in lib/functions.php before being used in a "create_function()" function call. This can be exploited to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code.

Title: Flash XSS Analyzer Log update
Description: This Update modifies the way log is shown while running Flash XSS Analizer module, to clearly reflect the target with its result

Title: Image Viewer CP Gold Image2PDF ActiveX Exploit
Description: The vulnerability exists on ImageViewer2.OCX by passing a overly long argument to an insecure Image2PDF() method.

Title: Novell iPrint Client nipplib GetDriverSettings Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The flaw exists within the nipplib.dll component. When handling the exposed method GetDriverSettings the application assembles a string for logging consisting of the hostname/port provided as a parameter. When building this message the process will blindly copy user supplied data into a fixed-length buffer on the stack.

Title: Image Viewer CP Gold TifMergeMultiFiles ActiveX Exploit
Description: The vulnerability exists on ImageViewer2.OCX by passing a overly long argument to an insecure TifMergeMultiFiles() method.

Title: PhpMyAdmin Unserialize Remote Code Execution Exploit Update

Exploit Platform: Windows, Solaris, Linux, Mac OS X

Title: Microsoft Excel XLB File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit (MS11-021)
Description: The vulnerability exists within the application's parsing of a particular record within a Microsoft Excel Compound Document. When specifying a particular value, the application will fail to initialize a variable that is used as the length of a memcpy operation.

Title: Tomcat orderby Cross Site Scripting Exploit
Description: The session list screen (provided by sessionList.jsp) in affected versions uses the orderBy and sort request parameters without applying filtering and therefore is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack. Users should be aware that Tomcat 6 does not use httpOnly for session cookies by default so this vulnerability could expose session cookies from the manager application to an attacker.

Title: Xampp php_self Cross Site Scripting Exploit
Description: XAMPP suffers from multiple XSS issues in several scripts that use the 'PHP_SELF' variable. The vulnerabilities can be triggered in the 'xamppsecurity.php', 'cds.php' and 'perlinfo.pl' because there isn't any filtering to the mentioned variable in the affected scripts. Attackers can exploit these weaknesses to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a user's browser session.

Title: Microsoft Windows Font Library File Buffer Overrun Vulnerability Exploit (MS11-077)
Description: When a crafted ".fon" file is loaded by Windows Kernel this produces a kernel heap overflow.This module exploits this vulnerability filling the kernel memory via heap spraying and building a fake chunk header.

Title: Audio Converter PLS File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in Audio Converter when handling .PLS files. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted .PLS file.

Title: Word List Builder DIC File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in Word Builder which is triggered by a malformed DIC file.

Title: Iconics Genesis SCADA HMI Genbroker Server Exploit
Description: The Genesis GenBroker service is listening port 38080 and is affected by integer overflow vulnerabilities while handling crafted packets in opcode 0x4b0.

Title: Oracle GlassFish Server Administration Console Authentication Bypass Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The Administration Console of Oracle GlassFish Server is prone to an authentication bypass vulnerability, which can be achieved by performing HTTP TRACE requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this in order to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server.
Exploit Platform: Solaris, Windows, Linux, Mac OS X

Title: Safari Webkit SVG Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: Webkit, as used in Apple Safari before 5.06 is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability caused by a web site with a crafted SVG graphic. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

Title: Lotus Notes LZH Attachment Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in Lotus Notes when parsing a malformed, specially crafted LZH file received as an email attachment.

Title: HP Operations Manager Server Backdoor Account Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a remote code execution vulnerability in HP Operations Manager by using an undocumented user account to upload an arbitrary file.This update fixes an issue in the agent injector.

Title: Symantec AppStream LaunchObj ActiveX Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits an arbitrary file download and execute vulnerability in the LaunchObj ActiveX Control included in Symantec AppStream Client.This update fixes an issue in the agent connector.

Title: Blue Coat Authentication and Authorization Agent Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Blue Coat BCAAA is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks. This exploit bypasses DEP protection by using ROP techniques.

Title: FreeAmp FAT File Handling Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in FreeAmp. The buffer overflow is triggered when a specially crafted theme file is opened.

Title: ActiveFax Server FTP Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: ActiveFax Server's FTP service has a remote buffer overflow vulnerability that can be exploited by an authenticated atacker.

Title: HP OpenView Performance Insight Server Backdoor Account Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a hidden account in the com.trinagy.security.XMLUserManager Java class. When using this account, an attacker can abuse the com.trinagy.servlet.HelpManagerServlet class and write arbitary files to the system allowing the execution of arbitary code.

Title: Zend Server Java Bridge Design Flaw Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Java Bridge component of Zend Server.

Title: The KMPlayer MP3 Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in The KMPplayer when parsing a malformed, specially crafted .MP3 file.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer MSHTML CObjectElement Use After Free Exploit (MS11-050) Update
Description: This module exploits a Use-After-Free vulnerability on Internet Explorer 7.This update fixes the CVE number.

Title: Microsoft Windows CSRSS Local EOP SrvSetConsoleNumberOfCommand Vulnerability DoS (MS11-056)
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability on Microsoft Windows "CSRSS.EXE" process and causes a BSoD.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugsor have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Adobe Acrobat Reader x3d Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: An specific flaw exists within the application explicitly trusting astring's length embedded within a particular file that is loaded by bothtesselate.x3d and 3difr.x3d plugins.

Title: Novell File Reporter Engine RECORD Tag Parsing Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow in Novell File Reporter by sending a specially crafted packet.

Title: IBM Tivoli Endpoint lcfd opts Argument Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in IBM Tivoli Endpoint by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.The specific flaw exists within the lcfd.exe process which listens by default on TCP port 9495.To reach this page remotely authentication is required. However, by abusing a built-in account an attacker can access the restricted pages. While parsing requests to one of these, the process blindly copies the contents of a POST variable to a 256 byte stack buffer.

Title: Microsoft Visio 2003 MFC71ENU DLL Hijacking Exploit(MS11-055)
Description: Microsoft Visio 2003 is prone to a vulnerability that may allow the execution of any library file named MFC71ENU.DLL, if this dll is located in the same folder as an .VSD file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Tabular Data Control ActiveX Exploit Reliability Enhancement
Description: This updates improves the reliability and AV Evasion of Microsoft Internet Explorer Tabular Data Control ActiveX Exploit.

Title: Citrix EdgeSight Remote DoS
Description: Citrix EdgeSight is prone to a Denial of Service within the LauncherService.exe component which listens by default on TCP port 18747. When handling a request the process trusts a user supplied field in the packet specifying the length of data to follow, the process then copies the user supplied data, without validation, into a fixed-length buffer on the heap.

Title: NVIDIA RealityServer Web Services RTMP Server DoS
Description: This module exploits a NULL pointer dereference in NVIDIA Reality Server Software, when a crafted package is send to  port 1935.

Title: Adobe Flash Player Arguments Indexing Exploit
Description: Flash Player is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability that is caused by the lack of bounds-checking when indexing the arguments of a function.This can be exploited to execute arbitrary code by enticing an unsuspecting user to visit a malicious Web page containing a specially crafted SWF file.This exploit bypasses ASLR and DEP in order to deploy an agent.

Title: HP Data Protector Client EXEC_SETUP Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a design flaw in HP Data Protector by sending a specially crafted EXEC_SETUP request.The specific flaw exists within the implementation of the EXEC_SETUP command. This command instructs a Data Protector client to download and execute a setup file. A malicious attacker can instruct the client to access a file off of a share thus executing arbitrary code under the context of the current user.

Title: MutableDecoder
Description: Enhance fixed egg SimpleXorEgg with a new one which have no fixed code.

Title: MutableDecoder
Description: Enhance fixed egg SimpleXorEgg with a new one which have no fixed code.

Title: Siemens Tecnomatix FactoryLink CSService Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A vulnerability found on Siemens FactoryLink vulnerability occurs when CSService.exe processes a CSMSG_ListFiles_REQ message, causing a stack overflow.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Time Element Memory Corruption Exploit (MS11-050)
Description: The Timed Interactive Multimedia Extensions implementation in Microsoft Internet Explorer does not properly handle objects in memory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by accessing an object that was not properly initialized or is deleted.

Title: HP Data Protector Omniinet.exe Remote Buffer Overflow
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in HP DataProtector by sending a specially crafted packet to the vulnerableOmniinet.exe service.

Title: Microsoft WINS Service Failed Response Vulnerability DoS (MS11-035) Update
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the Microsoft WINS service by sending a request packet followed by a RESET connection packet to the service.

Title: DATAC RealWin SCADA Server Login Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: DATAC Realwin is prone to a buffer-overflow when processing On_FC_CONNECT_FCS_LOGIN packets with an overly long user name.

Title: Microsoft Excel SLK File Parsing Buffer Overflow Exploit (MS11-045) Update
Description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted .SLK files.This version adds Office 2003 support.

Title: Symantec IM Manager IMAdminSchedTask eval Command Injection Exploit
Description: This updates adds support for extra connection methods and web browser fingerprinting capabilities. Also, for consistency reasons, the module's display name was changed from "Symantec IM Manager Administrative Interface IMAdminSchedTask.asp Remote Code Execution Exploit" to "Symantec IM Manager IMAdminSchedTask eval Command Injection Exploit.

Title: HP Data Protector Manager RDS DoS
Description: The RDS service (rds.exe) in HP Data Protector Manager 6.11 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a packet with a large data size to TCP port 1530.

Title: Microsoft Windows SMB Server Stop Responding DoS (MS11-048)
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability on Microsoft Windows SMB Server via a SMB crafted packet.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations.  Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Microsoft Excel SLK File Parsing Buffer Overflow Exploit (MS11-045)
Description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted .SLK files.This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Sun Java Runtime Environment Trusted Methods Chaining Exploit
Description: The specific flaw exists within the code responsible for ensuring proper privileged execution of methods. If an untrusted method in an applet attempts to call a method that requires privileges, Java will walk the call stack and for each entry verify that the method called is defined within a class that has that privilege. However, this does not take into account an untrusted object that has extended the trusted class without overwriting the target method.

Title: Microsoft Internet Explorer MSHTML CObjectElement Use After Free Exploit (MS11-050)
Description: This module exploits a Use-After-Free vulnerability on Internet Explorer 7.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: PolicyKit pkexec Race Condition Exploit
Description: This module exploits a local race-condition vulnerability in PolicyKit, which allows local users to execute arbitrary code with root privileges.

Title: CA Total Defense UNCWS Web Service UnAssignAdminUsers Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The UNCWS Web Service component of CA Total Defense listens for SOAP requests. The UnAssignAdminUsers method makes use of the uncsp_UnassignAdminRoles stored procedure, which is vulnerable to SQL Injection. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable machine with SYSTEM privileges.

Title: Microsoft Windows Win32k OTF Validation DoS (MS11-041)
Description: This module causes a BSOD in Microsoft Windows when parsing a specially crafted OpenType font file.This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Microsoft Office Word wdGetApplicationObject Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: Microsoft Office Word is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability when the wdGetApplicationObject function processes a malformed Word document. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary code by convincing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted .DOC file.

Title: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V VMBus Non Responsiveness Vulnerability DoS (MS11-047)
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability on Microsoft Hyper-V sending a crafted packet from the "guest OS" to the "host OS" through the vmbus mechanism producing a non responsiveness effect in the all virtual machines running at the time.

Title: Avaya Windows Portable Device Manager (WinPDM) Buffer Overfow Exploit
Description: A boundary error in the Unite Host Router service (UniteHostRouter.exe) when processing certain requests can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow.

Title: HP Rational Quality Manager Backdoor Account Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote code execution vulnerability in HP Rational Quality Manager by using an undocumented user account to upload an arbitrary file.

Title: Serva32 HTTP Server GET command DoS
Description: Serva32 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability when handling malformed GET commands.

Title: VMWare Infrastructure Client tsgetxu71ex552.dll ActiveX Exploit
Description: The vulnerability exists within the way that Internet Explorerinstantiates GET Extension Factory COM objects, which are not intended to be created inside of the browser. The object does not initialize properly, and this leads to a memory corruption vulnerability.

Title: Oracle VM Server Virtual Server Agent Command Injection Exploit
Description: By including shell meta characters within the second parameter to the 'urt_test_url' XML-RPC methodCall, an attacker can execute arbitrary commands. The service typically runs with root privileges.

Title: Microsoft WINS Service Failed Response Vulnerability DoS (MS11-035)
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability on Microsoft WINS service by sending a request packet followed by a RESET connection packet.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugsor have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: CA Total Defense UNCWS Web Service getDBConfigSettings Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The UNCWS Web Service component of CA Total Defense listens for SOAP requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker can invoke the getDBConfigSettings method, and the Web Service will answer with the server's database credentials. Once that the database credentials are captured, it is possible for a remote attacker to connect to the database and execute arbitrary code under the context of the database administrator.

Title: Microsoft Windows OpenType Stack Overflow DoS (MS11-032)
Description: This module exploits a kernel stack exhaustion in Microsoft Windows when parsing a specially crafted OpenType font file.

Title: NewStealthWrapper
Description: This update adds a wrapper to any agent that is created to be directly deployed and run on target systems. This wrapper helps evade detection of the agent by Anti Virus programs.

Title: BakBone NetVault SmartDisk Integer Overflow DoS
Description: This module hangs the BakBone NetVault SmartDisk Server because it fails to properly handle user-supplied malformed packets.

Title: Tomcat Deploy Manager Default Account Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote code execution vulnerability in Tomcat Web Server by using an default user account to upload an arbitrary file.

Title: Foxit Reader Javascript Arbitrary File Write Exploit
Description: Foxit PDF Reader 4.2 Javascript File Write. Foxit enables the user document to create files on any directory without further checks.

Title: VLC Media Player MKV File Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in VideoLan Media Player (VLC). A memory corruption vulnerability in the MKV demuxer plugin (ibmkv_plugin) in VLC Media Player 1.1.6.1 and earlier allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a MKV media file.

Title: OracleDB CSA Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the Client System Analyzer component of the Oracle Database Server.

Title: Network Post Exploitation improvements v11 rev1
Description: This update improves reliability of "Pass The Hash", "Who is There" and "Remote Desktop Access" modules, which happened to have problems when executed in the context of an agent running as SYSTEM user.

Title: Symantec IM Manager Administrative Interface IMAdminSchedTask.asp  Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Symantec IM Manager. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability in that a logged in user must be coerced into visiting a malicious link. The specific flaw exists within the ScheduleTask method exposed by the IMAdminSchedTask.asp page hosted on the web interface. This function does not properly sanitize user input from a POST variable before passing it to an eval call.

Title: Symantec IM Manager Administrative Interface IMAdminSchedTask.asp Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Symantec IM Manager. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability in that a logged in user must be coerced into visiting a malicious link. The specific flaw exists within the ScheduleTask method exposed by the IMAdminSchedTask.asp page hosted on the web interface. This function does not properly sanitize user input from a POST variable before passing it to an eval call.

Title: Lotus Notes Applix Viewer Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in Lotus Notes 8.5.2 when parsing a malformed, specially crafted AS (Applix Spreadsheet) file.

Title: VisiWave Site Survey Report File Processing Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in VisiWave Site Survey Report when handling report files. This can be exploited to cause a stack based buffer overflow via a specially crafted .VWR file. This module bypass DEP using ROP techniques.

Title: Microsoft Excel HFPicture Record Parsing Buffer Overflow Exploit (MS10-038)
Description: Buffer overflow in Microsoft Office Excel allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted .XLS file with a malformed HFPicture (0x866) record.

Title: 7T Interactive Graphical SCADA System IGSSdataServer Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a remote stack-based buffer overflow in IGSSdataServer by sending a malformed packet to the 12401/TCP port.This version add CVE.

Title: ACDSee Photo Editor 2008 XMB File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: ACDSee Photo Editor is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability due to a boundary error when processing XBM image files.

Title: Apple QuickTime _Marshaled_pUnk Backdoor Param Arbitrary Code Execution Exploit Update
Description: QuickTime has a backdoor in QTPlugin.ocx implemented during development cycle, this can be used by execute arbitrary code under the context of the browser.This version add CVE.

Title: Microsoft Windows OpenType Font Double Free DoS (MS10-091)
Description: A double free vulnerability in the OpenType Font (OTF) driver in Windows could allow local users to escalate their privileges via a specially crafted OpenType font.

Title: IBM Lotus Domino NSFComputeEvaluateExt Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in IBM Lotus Domino by sending a specially crafted HTTP request to the Web Administration Interface.

Title: NetSupport Manager Agent Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack based buffer overflow in Netsupport Agent via a long control hostname to TCP port 5405.

Title: Novell ZENworks Asset Management Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a path traversal vulnerability in Novell ZENworks Asset Management.The specific flaw exists within a servlet provided within the Novell Zenworks distribution for uploading files. When processing the path name for the file, the servlet will allow a user to inject path traversal entities into the filename. Then, when the servlet downloads the provided file, the destination will store it to the user-provided location.

Title: Pointdev IDEAL Administration IPJ Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Pointdev IDEAL Administration, when importing a project file, may allow a remote unprivileged user who provides a crafted IPJ document that is opened by a local user to execute code on the system with the privileges of the user running Pointdev IDEAL Administration. This can be exploited to cause a stack based buffer overflow when a specially crafted file is imported.

Title: Mac OS X i386_set_ldt Vulnerability Local Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability on "i386_set_ldt" function of "mach_kernel" creating a "call gate" entry in the LDT.

Title: IBM Lotus Domino iCalendar Attachment Name Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A stack-based buffer overflow exists in the nRouter.exe component of IBM Lotus Domino when parsing the filename of an attachment within an iCalendar invitation. This can be exploited by a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted e-mail to the Lotus Domino SMTP server.This module bypasses Data Execution Prevention (DEP) in order to install an agent on the target machine.

Title: EMC HomeBase SSL Service Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a path traversal vulnerability in the SSL service of EMC HomeBase Server.

Title: eyeOS callback Cross Site Scripting Exploit
Description: A reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in eyeOS 2.3 can beexploited to execute arbitrary JavaScript.

Title: HP OpenView NNM jovgraph displayWidth Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in the jovgraph.exe CGI application, a component of HP OpenView Network Node Manager, by sending a specially crafted packet.

Title: IBM Lotus Domino nLDAP Remote DoS
Description: IBM Lotus Domino is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input.

Title: HP OpenView NNM nnmRptConfig CGI Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in the nnmRptConfig.exe CGI application, a component of HP OpenView Network Node Manager, by sending a specially crafted packet.

Title: HP OpenView NNM nnmRptConfig schd_select1 CGI Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in the nnmRptConfig.exe CGI application, a component of HP OpenView Network Node Manager, by sending a specially crafted packet.

Title: HP OpenView NNM nnmRptConfig Template CGI Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in the nnmRptConfig.exe CGI application, a component of HP OpenView Network Node Manager, by sending a specially crafted packet.

Title: Microsoft Office Excel RTD Data Record Processing Stack Overwrite Exploit (MS11-021) Update
Description: The flaw exists within the methods used for RealTimeData Record Parsing. When handling a stTopic field has a bit set specifying double byte characters in the following field the value of a global pointer is improperly calculated.This version add Windows 7 support.

Title: Microsoft Office Excel RTD Data Record Processing Stack Overwrite Exploit (MS11-021)
Description: The flaw exists within the methods used for RealTimeData Record Parsing. When handling a stTopic field has a bit set specifying double byte characters in the following field the value of a global pointer is improperly calculated.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs

Title: Microsoft Windows SMB Browser Pool Corruption Vulnerability DoS (MS11-019)
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability on "mrxsmb.sys"/"bowser.sys" when a "Browser Election Request Packet" is sent to the "Active Directory" service running in the target.

Title: Microsoft Windows DNS Resolution Remote DoS (MS11-030) Update
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption in the DNS Client Service by sending a specially crafted LLMNR broadcast queries to crash the service.

Title: Adobe Flash Player SWF File Memory Corruption Exploit Update
Description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability when parsing a specially crafted .SWF file, which can be exploited by remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable machines by convincing an unsuspecting user to visit a malicious web site.This vulnerability has been found exploited in-the-wild during April 2011.This update adds support for Windows Seven.

Title: Iconics  Genesis 32 WebHMI ActiveX Stack Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the GenVersion.dll module included in the Iconics Genesis 32 application. The exploit is triggered when the SetActiveXGUID() method processes a malformed argument resulting in a memory corruption.

Title: Iconics Genesis 32 WebHMI ActiveX Stack Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the GenVersion.dll module included in the Iconics Genesis 32 application. The exploit is triggered when the SetActiveXGUID() method processes a malformed argument resulting in a memory corruption.

Title: Microsoft PowerPoint Invalid TimeColorBehaviorContainer Record Code Execution Exploit Update
Description: Microsoft Powerpoint parses a record associated with animation. If a container holds a specific record type, the application will explicitly trust a length used in this record to calculate a pointer for copying floating point numbers to. This can be used to write outside of an allocated buffer and will lead to code execution under the context of the application.This update adds Office 2010 support.

Title: ProFTPD Telnet IAC Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack overflow vulnerability in proftpd in order to install an agent. The vulnerability is within the function pr_netio_telnet_gets(). The issue is triggered when processing specially crafted Telnet IAC packets delivered to the FTP server.

Title: Bugtracker.net edit_comment Cross Site Scripting Exploit
Description: The application fails to sanitize the bug_id parameter in several pages such as edit_comment and edit_bug, leading to a cross site scripting vulnerability.

Title: RealNetworks Arcade Games ActiveX Control Exploit
Description: This module runs a web server waiting for vulnerable clients (Internet Explorer with a vulnerable StubbyUtil.InstallerDlg.1 ActiveX Control) to connect to it. When the client connects, it will try to install an agent by sending a specially crafted HTML page which exploits the Real Networks Arcade Game's ActiveX control. ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability.Ref: http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/17149/

Title: Wireshark packet dect  Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in the DECT dissector of Wireshark.A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the Wireshark executable to crash or potentially to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Wireshark.

Title: Wireshark packet dect Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in the DECT dissector of Wireshark. A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the Wireshark executable to crash or potentially to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Wireshark.

Title: Wireshark packet dect Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack buffer overflow in Wireshark when opening a crafted .PCAP file, resulting in arbitrary code execution.This module bypass DEP using ROP techniques.

Title: VLC Media Player libmodplug Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: VLC Media Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of user supplied data. Anattacker is able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the userwhen opening malicious .S3M media files.

Title: Novell File Reporter Agent XML Tag Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in Novell File Reporter. This vulnerability can be exploited remotely by sending a specially crafted packet to port TCP/3037.

Title: Iconics Genesis SCADA HMI Genbroker Server DoS
Description: GenBroker runs as a Windows service on port 38080 when Iconics Genesis 32 is installed. This service is affected by an integer overflow vulnerability during the handling of inbound packets, caused by the allocation of the memory needed for the creation of an array trusting the number of elements passed by the client.

Title: Wordtrainer ORD File Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to boundary errors in Wordtrainer 3.0 within the processing of .ORD files. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow when the victim opens a specially crafted file with an overly long supplied data.

Title: 7T Interactive Graphical SCADA System IGSSdataServer Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote stack-based buffer overflow in IGSSdataServer by sending a malformed packet to the 12401/TCP port.

Title: Progea Movicon SCADA-HMI TCPUploadServer Remote Exploit
Description: This module exploits a remote vulnerability in the TCPUploadServer service included in the Movicon 11 application to install an agent by writing and running an executable file.

Title: Microsoft Windows DNS Resolution Remote DoS (MS11-030)
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption in the DNS Client Service by sending a specially crafted LLMNR broadcast query to crash the service.This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Microsoft PowerPoint Invalid TimeColorBehaviorContainer Record Code Execution Exploit
Description: Microsoft Powerpoint parses a record associated with animation. If a container holds a specific record type, the application will explicitly trust a length used in this record to calculate a pointer for copying floating point numbers to. This can be used to write outside of an allocated buffer and will lead to code execution under the context of the application.

Title: DATAC RealWin STARTPROG Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: DATAC RealWin is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability when handling On_FC_SCRIPT_FCS_STARTPROG packets with an overly long string.

Title: DATAC RealWin ADDTAGMS Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: DATAC RealWin is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability when handlingOn_FC_CTAGLIST_FCS_ADDTAGMS packets with an overly long string.

Title: Barcodewiz BarcodeWiz.dll LoadProperties ActiveX Exploit Update
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the BarcodeWiz.dll module included in the Barcodewiz application.  The exploit is triggered when the LoadProperties() method processes a malformed argument resulting in a memory corruption.  This module runs a malicious web site on the CORE IMPACT Console and waits for an unsuspecting user to trigger the exploit by connecting to the web site.This version fixes a bug in the classname of the onelink feature.

Title: Adobe Flash Player SWF File Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability when parsing a specially crafted .SWF file, which can be exploited by remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable machines by convincing an unsuspecting user to visit a malicious web site.This vulnerability has been found exploited in-the-wild during April 2011.

Title: Symantec AMS Intel Alert Service AMSSendAlertAck Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow in the Intel Alert Handler Service.

Title: Microsoft Windows SMTP Server MX Record Vulnerability DoS (MS10-024) Update
Description: This update fixes some mistakes in the module documentation.This module exploits a vulnerability on Microsoft Windows SMTP Server 64 bits sending a malformed DNS response from a spoofed DNS Server.

Title: Microsoft Windows Media Player DVR-MS Memory Corruption Exploit (MS11-015) Update
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption in Windows Media Player when parsing a malformed DVR-MS file. This update fixes an issue in the agent connector.

Title: Postgres Plus Advanced Server DBA Management Server Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The DBA Management Server component of EnterpriseDB Postgres Plus Advanced Server does not restrict access to the underlying JBoss JMX Console. This can be abused by remote, unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server.

Title: Kingview SCADA HMI HistorySvr Heap Overflow Exploit
Description: KingView Scada is vulnerable to a buffer overflow error in the "HistorySvr.exe" module when processing malformed packets sent to port 777/TCP.

Title: Barcodewiz BarcodeWiz.dll LoadProperties ActiveX Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the BarcodeWiz.dll module included in the Barcodewiz application.  The exploit is triggered when the LoadProperties() method processes a malformed argument resulting in a memory corruption.  This module runs a malicious web site on the CORE IMPACT Console and waits for an unsuspecting user to trigger the exploit by connecting to the web site.

Title: RealNetworks RealPlayer CDDA URI ActiveX Exploit
Description: An ActiveX control in RealNetworks RealPlayer 11.0 through 11.1, RealPlayer SP 1.0 through 1.1.4, and RealPlayer Enterprise 2.1.2 does not properly initialize an unspecified object component during parsing of a CDDA URI, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (uninitialized pointer dereference and application crash) via a long URI.

Title: Oracle Java Applet2ClassLoader Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: The sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader class of Oracle Java does not properly validate if the URL of a Java class file matches the "codebase" parameter while loading applets. This vulnerability allows an applet to execute arbitrary code outside the sandbox without restrictions, which can be exploited to install an agent on the target machine.

Title: VLC Media Player NSV Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the way that VLC handles specially crafted .NSV (Nullsoft streaming video file) files when opening in Internet Explorer 6 or 7.

Title: VLC Media Player AMV File Memory Corruption Exploit
Description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the way that VLC handles specially crafted .AMV files.

Title: Adobe Flash Player SWF File Uninitialized Memory Exploit
Description: A vulnerability has been identified in Adobe Flash Player, which could be exploited by attackers to compromise a vulnerable system. This issue is caused by an uninitialized memory access triggered by a specially crafted .SWF file, which could be exploited by attackers to execute arbitrary code.This vulnerability has been found exploited in-the-wild during March 2011.

Title: Microsoft .NET Runtime Optimization Service Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: The .NET Runtime Optimization Service, part of the .NET Framework, is prone to a privilege escalation vulnerability, which can be exploited by local unprivileged users to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.

Title: Phoenix Project Manager wbtrv32 DLL Hijacking Exploit
Description: Phoenix Project Manager is prone to a vulnerability that may allow the execution of any library file named wbtrv32.dll, if this dll is located in the same folder as a .PPX file.The attacker must entice a victim into opening a specially crafted .PPX file. This file and the associated binary may be delivered to a user through remote WebDAV shares. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code.

Title: Blackmoon FTP Server PORT DoS
Description: This module shuts down the Blackmoon FTP Server because it fails to properly handle user-supplied malformed packets.

Title: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V VMBus Vulnerability DoS (MS10-102) Update
Description: This module adds support to Microsoft Windows 2003, Microsoft Windows Vista and Microsoft Windows Seven as a "guest OS".This module exploits a vulnerability on Microsoft Hyper-V sending a crafted packet from the "guest OS" to the "host OS" through the vmbus mechanism.

Title: Microsoft Windows Media Player DVR-MS Memory Corruption Exploit (MS11-015)
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption in Windows Media Player when parsing a malformed DVR-MS file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugsor have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: VicFTPS Server LIST Command DoS
Description: VicFTPS is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to handle exceptional conditions.

Title: TYPSoft FTP Server RETR DoS
Description: This module shuts down the TYPSoft FTP Server because it fails to properly handle user-supplied malformed packets using for login the Anonymous user provided by default for the program

Title: CA ARCserve D2D Apache Axis2 Default Credentials Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: CA ARCserve D2D installs the Apache Axis2 Web services engine with the default password for the administrator account, which can be abused by a remote attacker to upload an .AAR web service and execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges on the machine where the vulnerable software is installed.

Title: Inetserv POP3 Server RETR DoS
Description: Inetserv shuts down the POP3 Server because it fails to properly handle user-supplied malformed RETR packets.

Title: Microsoft Remote Desktop dwmapi DLL Hijacking Exploit (MS11-017)
Description: Microsoft Remote Desktop is prone to a vulnerability that may allow the execution of any library file named dwmapi.dll, if this dll is located in the same folder as an .RDP file.WARNING: This is an early release module. This is not the final version of this module. It is a pre-released version in order to deliver a module as quickly as possible to our customers that may be useful in some situations. Since this module is not the final version it may contain bugs or have limited functionality and may not have complete or accurate documentation.

Title: Symantec AMS Intel Alert Service Modem String Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Symantec AMS Intel Handler Service and installs an agent onto the target machine.

Title: Symantec AMS Intel Alert Handler Pin Number Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Intel Handler Service.

Title: Cisco Secure Desktop CSDWebInstaller ActiveX Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in CSDWebInstaller.ocx included on Cisco Secure Desktop. The vulnerability is triggered when the ActiveX control verifies the signing authority names in the certificate chain but fails to properly verify the digital signature of an executable file that is downloaded and then executed.

Title: Control Microsystems ClearSCADA Remote DoS
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the ClearSCADA Server service by sending a malformed packet to the 5481/TCP port to crash the application.

Title: HP OpenView NNM ovas Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in the ovas service, part of the HP OpenView Network Node Manager application. The exploit triggers a stack-based buffer overflow by sending a specially crafted POST request with a malformed Destination Node variable to the vulnerable system and installs an agent if successful.

Title: Quick n Easy FTP Server Login DoS
Description: This module shuts down the Quick 'n Easy FTP Server because it fails to properly handle user-supplied malformed packets when login.

Title: ActFax Server LPD-LPR Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of software utilizing ActFax Server.The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error when processing an overly long Print Job command on the Line Printer Daemon Server (LPD-Server) . This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via an overly long, specially-crafted argument passed to the affected command.

Title: Edraw Office Viewer Component Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in the officeviewer.ocx control included in the Edraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX application. The exploit is triggered when the HttpPost() method processes a long string argument resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow.  This module runs a malicious web site on the CORE IMPACT Console and waits for an unsuspecting user to trigger the exploit by connecting to the web site.

Title: Solar FTP Server DoS
Description: Solar FTP Server is prone to a Denial of Service condition. It fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input with a specially crafted "USER" command, a remote attacker can potentially disable the FTP service.

Title: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management TFTPD Remote DoS
Description: The flaw exists within the novell-tftp.exe component which listens bydefault on UDP port 69. When handling a request the process blindlycopies user supplied data into a fixed-length buffer on the heap.

Title: HP Performance Insight helpmanager Servlet Remote Code Execution Exploit
Description: This module exploits an insufficient input validation and authentication error to upload and execute an arbitrary .JSP file in HP Performance Insight.

Title: MoviePlay LST Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in MoviePlay when handling .LST files. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted .LST file.This module runs a malicious web server on the CORE IMPACT Console and waits for an unsuspecting user to trigger the exploit by connecting to it.

Title: Avahi NULL UDP Packet DoS
Description: avahi-core/socket.c in avahi-daemon in Avahi before 0.6.29 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via an empty IPv4 or IPv6 UDP packet to port 5353.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incorrect fix for CVE-2010-2244.

Title: Anti Keylogger Elite Privilege Escalation Exploit Update 2
Description: This module exploits a vulnerability in Anti keylogger elite when the 0x002224A4 function is invoked with a specially crafted parameter. The IOCTL 0x002224A4 handler in the AKEProtect.sys device driver in Anti Keylogger Elite allows local users to overwrite memory and execute arbitrary code via malformed Interrupt Request Packet (Irp) parameters to obtain system privileges.This update improves the checks to verify whether the vulnerable application is installed or not.

Title: 7T Interactive Graphical SCADA System ODBC Server Remote Memory Corruption DoS
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption vulnerability in the IGSS ODBC Server by sending a malformed packet to the 20222/TCP port to crash the application.

Title: Phpmyadmin error BBcode Injection Exploit
Description: In error.php, PhpMyAdmin permits users to insert text and restricted tags (like BBCode). With the tag [a@url@page]Click Me[/a] you can insert your own page, and redirect all users to that page. This can be used to direct users to a page hosting an OS agent.

Title: Panda Global Protection AppFlt.sys Privilege Escalation Exploit
Description: This module exploits a memory corruption vulnerability in the AppFlt.sys driver of Panda Global Protection when handling a specially crafted IOCTL request. This vulnerability allows unprivileged local users to execute code with SYSTEM privileges.

Title: Media Player Classic iacenc DLL Hijacking Exploit
Description: Media Player Classic is prone to a vulnerability that may allow execution of iacenc.dll if this dll is located in the same folder than .FLV file. The attacker must entice a victim into opening a specially crafted .FLV file. This file and the associated binary may be delivered to a user through remote WebDAV shares. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code.

Title: Real Networks RealPlayer SP RecordClip Exploit
Description: This module exploits an arbitrary file download vulnerability in the RecordingManager Control included in RealPlayer SP.

Title: IBM solidDB Packet Processing DoS
Description: IBM solidDB does not properly perform a recursive call to a certain function upon receiving packet data containing a single integer field, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via a TCP session.

Title: Moodle phpcoverage_home Cross Site Scripting Exploit
Description: Moodle fails to sanitize the phpcoverage_home parameter in phpcoverage.remote.top.inc.php leading to a Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability.

This file and the associated binary may be delivered to a user through remote WebDAV shares. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code.

Title: SIELCO SISTEMI Winlog Malformed Packet Stack Buffer Overflow Exploit
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Sielco Sistemi Winlog when Run TCP/IP server is enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted 0x02 opcode to TCP port 46823.
